title: PURITO From Green Avocado Cleansing Balm 100ml / 3.38 fl. oz., Melt-In Moisture with Avocado Oil, Vegan, Cruelty-Free, Suitable for Dry Skin, Korean Skincare
date: Reviewed in Canada on January 30, 2024
content: I was hesitant to buy this product with no ingredients listed posted but decided to give it a try with so many good reviews, I also loved the fact that it had a green complex in it so I decided to give it a try. I looked at the ingredients soon as I received this package and was not happy with my choice. First few ingredients I don't even know what they are and then comes synthetic wax and vegetable oil. So I question if the green complex is even high quality or good for your skin. I decided to give it a try Nonetheless, it was super greasy on my face like I was rubbing pure food oil on my face didn't feel nice and absorbent just felt like it sat there, I also didn't like the fact that my eyes got so blurry I could barely see out of them after using this to take off my eye makeup... definitely won't be buying this product again. Super disappointed and if you're anything like me and like clean, fresh organic ingredients, this is not your product. I have gone ahead and posted a picture of the ingredients for all of you so you don't have to guess like I did when buying this product...ps.. the smell of this product smell like it's old ...like it's been sitting on a shelf for a very long time doesn't smell fresh, smells like cardboard and stale.

title: PURITO From Green Avocado Cleansing Balm 100ml / 3.38 fl. oz., Melt-In Moisture with Avocado Oil, Vegan, Cruelty-Free, Suitable for Dry Skin, Korean Skincare
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 2, 2023
content:
I like the premium feel of the jar that the product comes in. It also has a spatula very well placed as shown in the pictures.
The texture feels like coconut oil but smoother.

I followed the instructions which are as follows:
Starting on dry skin, massage into your skin for 30 seconds.
Add water to emulsify and melt away makeup.
Rinse with warm water to finish.

It does dissolve makeup however not completely so i would not rely on this as the only makeup remover there. You need at least a microfiber cloth to remove the remaining makeup or a face wash and a toner as normal.
It has not caused me any side effects and I generally like it. I do think is so overpriced but you also do not need to use a lot of it as a little goes a long way. It also has clean ingredients so I can say it is somewhat good value for money considering everything but i do think that it is a on the pricer side.

title: PURITO From Green Avocado Cleansing Balm 100ml / 3.38 fl. oz., Melt-In Moisture with Avocado Oil, Vegan, Cruelty-Free, Suitable for Dry Skin, Korean Skincare
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 22, 2023
content:
I really like this cleaner - it is gentle and effective.

The cleanser is soft and creamy and smells quite pleasant but not really of anything much

It is full of great natural ingredients - Avocado Oil, Green Flora Complex and Watermelon Seed & Baobab Seed Oil and Kale Leaf, Spinach Leaf, Broccoli, Mugwort Leaf, and Cabbage Leaf extracts.

It comes in a screw top pot so easy to get all the product out so no waste.

title: PURITO From Green Avocado Cleansing Balm 100ml / 3.38 fl. oz., Melt-In Moisture with Avocado Oil, Vegan, Cruelty-Free, Suitable for Dry Skin, Korean Skincare
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 16, 2023
content:
The packaging for this cleansing balm is lovely, and makes it look more expensive than it is. I‚Äôve been using it for over a month now and have been really happy with the results.
 
I wear make up and fake tan which can be difficult to get off with balm cleansers, but was really pleased with how easily it removed my make up, especially eye make up, and it leaves my skin feeling super soft and glowy.
 
I prefer more natural skincare with less incredients as I have very sensitive skin, so have been very happy with how this has been working for me. It also smells incredible!

title: PURITO From Green Avocado Cleansing Balm 100ml / 3.38 fl. oz., Melt-In Moisture with Avocado Oil, Vegan, Cruelty-Free, Suitable for Dry Skin, Korean Skincare
date: Reviewed in the United States on March 6, 2024
content: I have oily akin, and sometimes I'll have to wash my face twice to make it stop feeling oily. It only takes one wash to feel clean! Clean, but not dry. I do still moisturize, but it's not to fix what this cleanser stripped. It smells good too, not floral or fruity- just clean.

title: PURITO From Green Avocado Cleansing Balm 100ml / 3.38 fl. oz., Melt-In Moisture with Avocado Oil, Vegan, Cruelty-Free, Suitable for Dry Skin, Korean Skincare
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 9, 2023
content: As expected for this type of balm, the consistency is slightly greasy, which makes it particularly efficient as a make-up remover. It did a great job on my Halloween make-up, feeling gentle even across my eyelids. It washed off easily under warm water and left my skin softer than when I started. It has a neutral scent.

title: PURITO From Green Avocado Cleansing Balm 100ml / 3.38 fl. oz., Melt-In Moisture with Avocado Oil, Vegan, Cruelty-Free, Suitable for Dry Skin, Korean Skincare
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 7, 2023
content:
This is a nice cleansing balm that does a good job of removing makeup and leaves your skin feeling nice and soft. I used this a good few times however, I have recently had lash extensions put on and my technician told me to avoid any oily facial washes as they can make the lashes drop out, so I have taken a break from using it again until they are off.

The balm itself is really easy to use. You simply need to scoop a bit out using the provided spatula, rub it between your fingers until it melts and softens before massaging it in circular motions all over your face. I then wash mine off with a flannel and warm water. The result (after toning and moisturising) is soft, cleansed skin.

At the time of this review, there was no price showing so I can't comment if it is good value but I can recommend it for doing what it is supposed to. 4/5

title: PURITO From Green Avocado Cleansing Balm 100ml / 3.38 fl. oz., Melt-In Moisture with Avocado Oil, Vegan, Cruelty-Free, Suitable for Dry Skin, Korean Skincare
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 7, 2023
content:
This Purito green avocado cleansing balm arrived nicely packed in a box. I like to receive my beauty products thoroughly packed due to hygiene reasons.

This is a gentle waterproof makeup remover. Only a small amount is needed in order to remove makeup. It will feel oily on the fingers especially when rubbing because the balm will melt like butter however after applying on the skin, it‚Äôs quite easy to remove and doesn‚Äôt leave any oil on the skin .

Highly recommended, works well but slightly overpriced.

title: PURITO From Green Avocado Cleansing Balm 100ml / 3.38 fl. oz., Melt-In Moisture with Avocado Oil, Vegan, Cruelty-Free, Suitable for Dry Skin, Korean Skincare
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 3, 2023
content: Lovely texture. Not as drying as some liquid cleansers. The balm is easy to apply and melts into the sink. I feel clean and fresh after.

title: PURITO From Green Avocado Cleansing Balm 100ml / 3.38 fl. oz., Melt-In Moisture with Avocado Oil, Vegan, Cruelty-Free, Suitable for Dry Skin, Korean Skincare
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 2, 2023
content: I've used products by this brand before and really enjoyed using them so I was excited to try the cleansing balm. The balm comes in a screw top jar complete with spatula. The product is easy to use and it quickly melts into your skin. I like to use it in the shower as part of a double cleanse. I tend to remove my eye make up with a smidge of jojoba oil and then go in with this to clean my face. I can hardly detect a scent which is ideal for people with sensitive skin. The balm contains avocado oil, watermelon seed and baobab oil. It also contains extracts of kale, Spinach, Broccoli, mugwort and cabbage leaf. I would definitely reach for this balm again.

title: PURITO From Green Avocado Cleansing Balm 100ml / 3.38 fl. oz., Melt-In Moisture with Avocado Oil, Vegan, Cruelty-Free, Suitable for Dry Skin, Korean Skincare
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 1, 2023
content: The packaging is lightweight and easy to travel with and comes with a scoop to apply with which I love as I don't enjoy the potential germ spread from sticking my fingers in everyday. I love the way this feels on my skin, I feel hydrated, nourished and smooth after use. I used it on my eye area and it didn't burn or create any blurriness in my eye but did take off all my stubborn eye make up HOWEVER afterwards I read that you should avoid the eye area which to me kind of makes it redundant as the reason I use a cleansing balm over anything else is to remove eye make up which is usually more stubborn. Smells great but if I can't use it on my eyes it's not something I would repurchase.

title: PURITO From Green Avocado Cleansing Balm 100ml / 3.38 fl. oz., Melt-In Moisture with Avocado Oil, Vegan, Cruelty-Free, Suitable for Dry Skin, Korean Skincare
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 30, 2023
content: This is quite nice, and nice ingedients. Good fragrance and texture, however I find it a bit greasy, although my face feels clean I feel that my face is left greasier after using, might be good for very dry skin types so in that case worth a try. Well packaged and good product.

title: PURITO From Green Avocado Cleansing Balm 100ml / 3.38 fl. oz., Melt-In Moisture with Avocado Oil, Vegan, Cruelty-Free, Suitable for Dry Skin, Korean Skincare
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 29, 2023
content:
This is a thick cleansing balm that melts beautifully on the skin when gently massaged. Works well as a cleanser but disappointed that it states that you must avoid the eye area, as I like to use one product to take off all my makeup. It is confusing as the pictures in the description seem to show it being taken right up to the eye area.

There isn't much smell to the product which is probably a bonus to those with sensitive skin, but personally, I like some perfume. I love that it is packed with ingredients to encourage healthy skin and it certainly leaves your skin feeling moisturised and mine is particularly dry.

I think this is a good cleanser and would happily recommend it at the price.

title: PURITO From Green Avocado Cleansing Balm 100ml / 3.38 fl. oz., Melt-In Moisture with Avocado Oil, Vegan, Cruelty-Free, Suitable for Dry Skin, Korean Skincare
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 29, 2023
content:
üåü The Purito From Green Cleansing Balm arrives boxed and comes in a 100ml recycled plastic tub with screw-on lid. The balm comes with a plastic spatula for scooping out product, and plastic top that sits on top of the balm to hold the spatula.

‚ûïÔ∏è As an MUA I've been using balms for years as I find them the most effective for removing makeup whilst also cleansing the skin, which is important for me as I can do quite heavy makeup looks for pictures which requires a lot of removal afterwards! I normally use the Elemis balm but always open to trying others!
‚ûïÔ∏è The Purito balm comes in very simplistic, green packaging. It's made from recycled materials and the balm is vegan friendly/cruelty free
‚ûïÔ∏è The balm itself appears to be fragrance free (I can't pick up any smell from it). The balm appears solid until you scoop some of it out, then it basically melts like butter. The balm feels both silky and oily between the fingers, and spreads onto the face with absolute ease. With these balms, you want to massage it onto your face for a good thirty seconds and then add and combine a tiny bit of water to the face and blend it all again. From there, you can either use cotton pads or a face cloth to wipe the balm and all your makeup off, or you can wash it off with warm water.
‚ûïÔ∏è I normally wash it off however sometimes I'll also just wipe it all away with a micro fibre face cloth.
Although the balm feels oily between the fingers, it doesn't leave your skin feeling oily and greasy after it's all wiped/washed away, so it's suitable for oily skin too. I find this balm really effective whilst also gentle enough to rub into my eyes to remove eye makeup, which you can't always do with some balms as it stings and irritates the eyes. The balm removes all traces of makeup with relative ease, leaving the skin feeling soft and cleansed.
‚ûïÔ∏è This specific balm is actually made in Korea, known for making great skincare products. The balm includes ingredients such as, watermelon seed oil, avocado oil, spinach leaf extract, cabbage leaf extract and more, so it's packed with lots of healthy green ingredients for the skin.

üåü Overall I've found this balm fab for removing all traces of heavy makeup, including on the eyes. It's both very effective and gentle. It glides on like a butter and leaves the skin feeling as though it's fresh as a daisy. After using daily for a couple of weeks, I haven't had any breakouts nor irritation on my skin. It also doesn't feel oily/greasy nor dried out. Definitely does the same quality of job as Elemis, however I think the only thing lacking for me in comparison is a nice fragrance!

title: PURITO From Green Avocado Cleansing Balm 100ml / 3.38 fl. oz., Melt-In Moisture with Avocado Oil, Vegan, Cruelty-Free, Suitable for Dry Skin, Korean Skincare
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 26, 2023

title: PURITO From Green Avocado Cleansing Balm 100ml / 3.38 fl. oz., Melt-In Moisture with Avocado Oil, Vegan, Cruelty-Free, Suitable for Dry Skin, Korean Skincare
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 24, 2023
content: I tried this cleaning balm, and it's been a great addition to my skincare routine.It's a gentle yet effective cleanser. The balm melts makeup and impurities away, leaving my skin feeling clean and refreshed.What's nice is that it contains natural ingredients, which is a plus for my sensitive skin. I also like that it doesn't leave my skin feeling dry or tight.The packaging is practical and easy to use. It's a simple but reliable cleansing balm, and I'm happy with the results on my skin.

title: PURITO From Green Avocado Cleansing Balm 100ml / 3.38 fl. oz., Melt-In Moisture with Avocado Oil, Vegan, Cruelty-Free, Suitable for Dry Skin, Korean Skincare
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 23, 2023
content:
I‚Äôm a big fan of cleansing balms for taking off my makeup so I was very much looking forward to trying this Avocado variety from Purito.

I used it the same way I would any other cleansing balm. It comes with a small plastic spatula but I prefer to use my fingers. I apply a small amount directly to my dry face and rub. The balm instantly starts melting my makeup away while I rub it in. I then use a damp cloth to wipe the balm and makeup away. I don‚Äôt rinse as I don‚Äôt feel I need to with balms. This one doesn‚Äôt leave any greasy residue and leaves my skin feeling fresh and clean.

I never use cleansing balms to remove eye makeup as they tend to get in my eyes and make my vision blurry for a few minutes which I prefer to avoid. Instead, I use micellar water.

This balm has a slightly artificial scent which I‚Äôm not a huge fan of but it is faint so it certainly doesn‚Äôt put me off using it.

It performs as well as other well known brands of cleansing balm so I‚Äôm happy to recommend üòä

title: PURITO From Green Avocado Cleansing Balm 100ml / 3.38 fl. oz., Melt-In Moisture with Avocado Oil, Vegan, Cruelty-Free, Suitable for Dry Skin, Korean Skincare
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 21, 2023
content: This is a top notch cleansing balm which get rids of oils, makeup and dead skin, since using this my skin has been much softer, cleaner and blemish free. I like the fact it came with a little scoop spatula.

title: PURITO From Green Avocado Cleansing Balm 100ml / 3.38 fl. oz., Melt-In Moisture with Avocado Oil, Vegan, Cruelty-Free, Suitable for Dry Skin, Korean Skincare
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 20, 2023
content:
I don't know how you could have an oily buttery cleanser but this works like magic. At first it looks solid but as soon as you put your finger in it you'll see that it's super buttery.

Really easy to apply and gives me the squeaky clean feeling I'd usually only be able to get when scrubbing my face with a face wash. Easily melts makeup or dirt without the slightest tug or pull and leaves my skin feeling super soft.

The texture is amazing. It starts off as a fairly balmy consistency and it melts almost instantly when it gets into contact with the skin. A bit of water will them emulsify it as you rub. Rinses off quicker than any face wash or scrub I've tried.

It doesn't leave behind an oily or tacky residue either. I usually need to use a moisturiser after cleansing because my face would feel a bit dehydrated, but not with this.

One of my favourite steps in my skincare routine at the moment and I'm certain I'll be back for more. I'd highly recommend.

title: PURITO From Green Avocado Cleansing Balm 100ml / 3.38 fl. oz., Melt-In Moisture with Avocado Oil, Vegan, Cruelty-Free, Suitable for Dry Skin, Korean Skincare

I apply this to dry skin and gentle massage all over my face for 30 seconds. I then add water which helps to emulsify and breakdown the makeup, sun cream + oil. It is very gentle on the skin and caused me no issues on my eyes or skin.

very good cleansing balm that reminds me of coconut butter.

title: PURITO From Green Avocado Cleansing Balm 100ml / 3.38 fl. oz., Melt-In Moisture with Avocado Oil, Vegan, Cruelty-Free, Suitable for Dry Skin, Korean Skincare

title: PURITO From Green Avocado Cleansing Balm 100ml / 3.38 fl. oz., Melt-In Moisture with Avocado Oil, Vegan, Cruelty-Free, Suitable for Dry Skin, Korean Skincare

content:
I have tried many cleansing balms in the past, but this one is truly exceptional. From the moment I opened the jar, I knew I was in for a treat. I have to say I am blown away. It's my new addition to my evening routine.

The texture of the balm is divine - it melts into the skin effortlessly, when water is added it emulsifies which effortlessly dissolves makeup, dirt, and impurities. It's gentle yet effective, leaving my skin feeling nourished, hydrated, and perfectly clean. Works wonders on waterproof mascara too. I would advise using only a little as it really does go a long way and it will last a good while. My skin feels so smooth as if it has been polished just love the feel.

This compares well in performance and price brilliantly to some other expensive alternatives out there.

title: PURITO Seoul Wonder Releaf Centella Toner Unscented Korean Centella, for Sensitive Skin, Soothing, Facial Toner for face, K-Beauty, 200ml 6.76 fl.oz
date: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2024
content:
I'm a 41yo skincare junkie with sensative combo skin that I am obsessed with keeping as youthful and healthy looking as possible. I love trying/using new K-Beauty products, as they are leaps ahead in the skincare game. One of the main active ingredients in this formula, Centella Asiatica, is an ancient Korean herb and, a very effective/magical one at that!

This toner arrived quick, well packaged and protected with proper saftey seals (around the package and across the top of the bottle itself). It also has a clear lot # and exp date stamped on the bottle.

The formula is a clear liquid that has a thickness of a 2.5 on my thickness scale (1 being water, 10 being a rich body butter. It glides across the skin well and absorbs super quick. Usually I stay away from scented products, but while this is 'scented' it isn't artificially fragranced. The 'scent' comes from all the wonderful extracts in the formula. This smells super fresh, clean and a bit spa like. I get a lot of earl gray tea too, probably from the bergamot. I absolutely LOVE how this smells and I honestly want to bathe in it. While it is delicious, the 'scent' isn't overpowering or nauseating at all.

They are not kidding when they claim this instantly soothes the skin! I'm literally amazed that even the worst, most inflamed, irritated and downright painful skin conditions immediately feel better after I apply this. It is my 'go to' now after getting a peel. It feels amazing on a sunburn too. And, out of pure curiosity I tried this on mosquito bites and the dreaded poison ivy. It not only took the itch/burn away immediately, but this helps heal any/all skin issues much quicker than anything else I've used. This formula is also a lifesaver when I have an event to go to and I have blemishes or uneven skin.

Not only is this soothing, it's incredibly hydrating too! Even when my skin isn't bad, I'll use this toner just because I love how soft, plump and bouncy it leaves my face.

I just came back to purchase my second bottle of this miracle toner and leave my review. This has definitely been an absolute skin saver /miracle product so far this summer and I don't really know what I would do without it at this point.

I actually forgot how much this cost, but I figured/planned to spend around $30-$35. I was STUNNED when I realized that this is no where near that price! (Even if this was $40, I would buy it and it would be worth every dollar!) At $16 a bottle (which is generously sized) you can't go wrong! If you have sensative skin, get rashes, bites, sunburn, eczema, get chemical peels or ANY other issue that irritates your skin- you NEED this product!

date: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2024
content:
Most toners I've tried have a similar consistency in the liquid, wet like water. This one seems unique in that it applies almost 'oily' but isn't actually oily.

It comes out in tiny droplets and applies onto your skin like the consistency of oily products, making it easier to apply than watery products. I'd normally be wary of this because that tends to lead to residue left on the skin or slow absorption. However, it dried almost immediately and left zero residue. No oily feeling, no stickiness.

It also is virtually scentless unless you are directly sniffing the product from the bottle. I prefer scentless products, so this is a big plus for me. I also have sensitive skin and notice zero redness or itchiness after using this product.

I think I may have found a new favorite toner. Fast absorption, easy application, scentless, no residue, and no sensitivity issues.

title: PURITO Seoul Wonder Releaf Centella Toner Unscented Korean Centella, for Sensitive Skin, Soothing, Facial Toner for face, K-Beauty, 200ml 6.76 fl.oz
date: Reviewed in the United States on June 2, 2024
content:
PURITO Seoul Wonder Releaf Centella Toner Korean Centella, Soothing, Hydration, Alchhole-Free Facial Toner for face, K-Beauty, 200ml 6.76 fl.oz.

This is a fantastic toner.

I‚Äôm a huge fan of K-beauty. This is no exception. I‚Äôd call this an essence rather than a toner. It‚Äôs so great. Once your face is clean and exfoliated you should pour a little in your hand and pat it all over your skin leaving your skin wet. Then apply your serums directly onto the wet toner and skin. This will create a delivery system to transport your serums deeper into the skin. Then apply your creams and sealants.

I find this to be an extremely high quality toner at an excellent value. It smells great. It soothes the skin and delivers all other products beautifully and seamlessly.

Highly recommend.

title: PURITO Seoul Wonder Releaf Centella Toner Unscented Korean Centella, for Sensitive Skin, Soothing, Facial Toner for face, K-Beauty, 200ml 6.76 fl.oz
date: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2024
content:
I am generally a fan of Korean skincare products, and this toner is a perfect example of why this is the case!

You receive a generous amount for the price, and the bottle allows you to perfectly control the amount dispensed, ensuring that you don't end up wasting product. It is completely unscented, which I love, and the ingredients all appear to be of high quality. Centella, which is not a common ingredient in western skincare, has a long and hallowed history in eastern medicine. It is known for its anti-inflammatory properties, as well as being an effective humectant that possibly boosts collagen.

My skin isn't terribly sensitive nor prone to redness, but I still find this toner to be highly beneficial to and appreciated by my skin. It also works beautifully under cosmetics, which is a nice bonus. Highly recommended!

title: PURITO Seoul Wonder Releaf Centella Toner Unscented Korean Centella, for Sensitive Skin, Soothing, Facial Toner for face, K-Beauty, 200ml 6.76 fl.oz
date: Reviewed in the United States on May 28, 2024
content:
This toner from PURITO Seoul is really thick and almost like a gelly toner instead of a normal one. Despite that, it's not sticky and left my skin feeling very smooth after it absorbed into my face. :) I found absorption time was around ten minutes.

I liked the scent and felt as if it smelled almost fresh. This does have added fragrance so if you hate smells in your skincare or are sensitive, look elsewhere. For me, it doesn't bother me as I love fragrance in my skincare. You may want to perform a patch test if you are unsure just in case.

Using it for over a week, I do notice less red blotchy areas. This is due to the primary centella ingredient which is known to soothe skin and help with hydration issues. Other hero ingredients are allantoin, Arginine, and rose flower oil. It's a nice formulation with Centella as the primary focus. :) I like how smooth my skin is and the texture has improved from the hydration this toner adds to my skin.

I think if you're looking for a Centella toner and don't mind fragrance, this is really nice because of how good it smells and the fact that Centella is the primary ingredient in this toner.

Anfangs wirkt der Toner etwas klebrig, aber er zieht relativ schnell ein und dann vergeht auch das klebrige Hautgef√ºhl. Die Haut f√ºhlt sich nach der Anwendung erfrischt und gepflegt an.
Obwohl ich eine sehr sensible Haut habe, konnte ich keinerlei Hautirritationen wie Juckreiz, Trockenheit oder Spannungen feststellen.

Insgesamt hat mich der Toner sowohl optisch als auch qualitativ √ºberzeugt. Er bietet eine tolle Pflegewirkung und verbessert das Hautbild schon nach wenigen Anwendungen sichtbar.
Den Preis empfinde ich jedoch als √ºberteuert. Daher ziehe ich einen Stern ab.

date: Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2024
content: This PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella Eye Cream has a silky texture and a fantastic herbal green scent that's not artificial or perfumy. I don't really have dark circles or puffiness around my eyes, but I do have rough-looking red, blotchy cheeks, which got worse during perimenopause, as well as some redness around my nose, and aging texture on the skin under my chin and on my neck. The Purito cream seems to help smooth things out, and diminish the appearance of rosacea, and so far it hasn't made me break out . Those who are unfamiliar with the name "Centella Asiatica" may know it better as Gotu Kola. Gotu Kola is an herb in the parsley family, with a long history of use in the traditional Chinese and Ayurvedic medicine systems. This herb contains certain chemicals that seem to decrease swelling and blood pressure. People use it to treat burns, poor circulation and varicose veins. It is also used for scars, stretch marks, and many other skin conditions and it seems to increase collagen production, which might be helpful for wound healing.

Note: Given the lack of testing requirements for cosmetics, and the often unsubstantiated claims for efficacy, I typically evaluate them based primarily on ingredients and quality. title: PURITO Centella Unscented Eye Cream, Korean Centella, for Sensitive Skin, Soothing, Facial Eye Cream for face, Dark Circles, Wrinkles, Puffiness, K-Beauty, Vegan & Cruelty-Free, 30ml 1fl.oz
date: Reviewed in the United States on May 19, 2024
content: I have been using this eye cream for a little over a week now, and have mostly positive things to say. The cream itself is a nice consistency, and does well to saturate into the skin. I find it has good moisturizing properties, and as such would probably contribute to the reduction of fine lines, and the crows feet type of effect you get at the corner of your eye. As far as reducing the signs of under eye discoloration or bags, I never noticed any difference in myself personally with any eye cream that I have ever tried, and that includes this one. I don't think that is something that can be changed with a cream, and would likely need surgical intervention for it to happen. So, for eye creams I have tempered my expectations due to this experience. As long as the eye cream does a good job in hydrating my skin, I would consider it a successful one. This eye cream does saturate nicely like I mentioned before, and hydrates well. It is also completely scentless which is important to me. That being said, I don't think I've ever had an eye cream that was scented. One very peculiar thing I have to mention however, is that I developed a small pimple close to the corner of my eye, which I have literally never had happened before. I don't know if this cream has something to do with that, or if it's just coincidence, but I figured it deserved mentioning. It is so out of the ordinary, that I couldn't even believe it. Again, I'm not saying this cream is responsible, but it did happen to me after I started using it. Other than that, it's fine under eye cream, and has good moisturizing properties. Time will tell how well it works over a longer extended period, but my initial impressions are decent.

title: PURITO Centella Unscented Eye Cream, Korean Centella, for Sensitive Skin, Soothing, Facial Eye Cream for face, Dark Circles, Wrinkles, Puffiness, K-Beauty, Vegan & Cruelty-Free, 30ml 1fl.oz
date: Reviewed in the United States on May 15, 2024
content:
This centella eye cream from PURITO SEOUL felt so soothing on hot summer days! It has a slight cooling effect that feels great on my skin when applied in the morning. Centella seems to be the main ingredient but there are a host of other good ingredients such as camellia, meadowfoam seed oil, ceramide NP, and shea butter! It wore well under makeup and left my dark circles looking much brighter and less prominent over the course of the week. :)

I think people should be aware there is added fragrance and Macadamia oil in this product. If you are sensitive to smells or allergic to tree nuts, this is not the product for you. This didn't affect my experience but I know it may affect the experience of many others.

Overall, this is a luxury eye cream that feels great and cooling on hot summer days as a little goes a long way. You won't have any issues wearing makeup over this eye cream and it can even act as a primer of sorts as I found my eyeshadow layered well over it because of the somewhat grippy smooth texture of the eye cream. I like this a lot and will reorder when the tube is empty.

title: PURITO Centella Unscented Eye Cream, Korean Centella, for Sensitive Skin, Soothing, Facial Eye Cream for face, Dark Circles, Wrinkles, Puffiness, K-Beauty, Vegan & Cruelty-Free, 30ml 1fl.oz

title: PURITO Centella Unscented Eye Cream, Korean Centella, for Sensitive Skin, Soothing, Facial Eye Cream for face, Dark Circles, Wrinkles, Puffiness, K-Beauty, Vegan & Cruelty-Free, 30ml 1fl.oz

content: This Korean centella eye cream is a really good quality skin care product. Centella is a flowering plant that helps with skin hydration, redness, and inflammation. This centella eye cream is very lightweight, soft, and creamy. It absorbs quickly leaving the skin supple and hydrated. It has a very nice, mild fragrant scent. It comes in a one fluid ounce tube, and it‚Äôs a vegan product made in Korea. This eye cream contains shea butter, panthenol, lavender oil, bergamot fruit oil, centella asiatica extract, and other ingredients. This cream is meant to calm irritation around the eye area. This eye cream is made with gentle ingredients and is cruelty free. I like it a lot and would recommend it. üòÉ

title: PURITO Centella Unscented Eye Cream, Korean Centella, for Sensitive Skin, Soothing, Facial Eye Cream for face, Dark Circles, Wrinkles, Puffiness, K-Beauty, Vegan & Cruelty-Free, 30ml 1fl.oz
date: Reviewed in the United States on May 14, 2024
content:
I am a 41yo skincare junkie with sensative combo skin that I am obsessed with keeping as youthful and healthy looking as possible. My obsession with K-Beauty keeps getting stronger, as these products are amazing- this eye cream being no exception.

The product arrived quickly, in a quality box that was sealed on both ends with a tamper proof seal (one with a QR code). The box has a clear lot # and expiration date (12/19/26) printed on the side. Inside, the easy squeeze tube also has a saftey seal covering the product opening as well as the matching lot # imprinted in the ridge of the plastic. This is definitely, without a doubt a legitimate product.

The formula itself is opaque white and has a thickness/density of a 6 on my thickness scale (1 being water, 10 being a rich body butter). It pats into the skin beautifully and absorbs well. Fragrance is thankfully NOT an ingredient that is included in this formulation, however the natural extracts do lend a wonderful, fresh and clean scent to the product. (This might be my favorite smell of any skincare product- ever!)

As the formula is absorbed into the skin, the delicate eye area immediately begins to feel softer. After just a few minutes, the skin even looks plumper and more filled out. I'm amazed that, minutes after my very first use, I could see very visable changes happening before my eyes. I've never had a product that got to work so quickly. The future definitely was promising!

Usually, I won't write a skincare product review after just a few weeks of use, as I feel it is too early to really notice any visible results. But this product product broke all the rules! Just a few weeks in and my eye bags have gone from terrible to null. I honestly looked like I hadn't slept in years and could haunt a house, but every day the bags got better, my dark circles improved and my skin got tighter, firmer and bounced right back every time I dabbed this game changing, holy grail product on.
Now, I'm not sure if the fuller, more hydrated skin is choking out the fine lines under my eyes or if the formula is erasing them all together. Either way, they are pretty much invisible now and this is the only thing I've changed in my routine.

I would expect a product like this, with an incredible and powerful ingredient line up and one that's SUPER effective to cost upwards of $50. And knowing what I know now (how well it works), I would happily pay it too! But the fact that this is LESS than $20 literally blows my mind.

Will I buy this again?
I already have! I bought 3 total, 2 for me and 1 for my mother. I'll continue to use/buy it too! This is, without a doubt, a holy grail product!

title: PURITO Centella Unscented Eye Cream, Korean Centella, for Sensitive Skin, Soothing, Facial Eye Cream for face, Dark Circles, Wrinkles, Puffiness, K-Beauty, Vegan & Cruelty-Free, 30ml 1fl.oz

title: PURITO Centella Unscented Cream, Korean Centella, for All Skin Types, Soothing, Facial Cream for face, K-Beauty, Korean Skin Care, 50ml 1.7 fl.oz
date: Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2024
content:
I debated on my rating between 4 and 5 stars, but rounded up since this has a lot of soothing ingredients and absorbs well. After using, my skin definitely feels smoother. I couldn't really tell a lot of improvement with redness, but I have a condition that is hard to treat so it's not really a fault of this product. This does have a scent that isn't too strong, but it does linger faintly for a while for those with sensitive noses.

This has 1.7061% Centella, so while you can get more concentrated products, it also has other Centella actives, like madecassic acid, asiaticoside, and asiatic acid, so it adds up to a little more. It also has niacinamide which helps improve skin in many ways and ingredients to help the skin barrier like glycerin, squalane, ceramide, palmitic acid, and phytosphingosine. The only thing keeping this from a solid 5 for me is that it has fragrance ingredients that can irritate sensitive skin, which is something that people experiencing redness should probably avoid. Otherwise, this would be a great cream.

I'm quickly realizing that Korean beauty products are made for layering. For that many things on the face, their products have a formulation that doesn't feel goopy. Even things that are for very dry skin. having now understood this, I think the Purito line of products is really stellar. I must admit that the products are not filled to the top of the tube which is slightly misleading.

title: PURITO Centella Unscented Cream, Korean Centella, for All Skin Types, Soothing, Facial Cream for face, K-Beauty, Korean Skin Care, 50ml 1.7 fl.oz
date: Reviewed in the United States on May 28, 2024
content:
This face cream from PURITO SEOUL is extremely hydrating without turning me into an oil slick. Sometimes, hydrating creams can make me look too shiny and this is the perfect balance of dewy and hydrated that I really enjoy so I'm quite in love with this cream. :) The size is somewhat small coming in at only 50ml but you only need a quarter-sized amount for your whole face and neck.

Featuring hero ingredients such as Centella, squalane, niacinamide, and ceramide NP, this is a super soother for red blotchy areas or dry patches on my face. I think this is a great follow-up for my nightly retinoid routine as it treats a lot of those issues quickly and leaves my face looking smooth and dewy instead of angry and red. :)

This does have added fragrance but it smells really nice and dies down quickly. Fragrance haters, this is not for you. Please consult a professional for something that works for you. If you have sensitive skin, please perform a patch test before using it as with all skincare.

I think overall, this is a really great hydrating face cream and I love how it's non-greasy while still being deeply moisturising. I'll be reordering this because it smells good and makes my face feel soft.

This cream is exactly what it says it is. It's rich but somehow does not feel heavy on my skin. It feels very hydrating and soothing for my dry & sensitive skin. I get red areas under my nose and at my cheeks - those areas were lessened. And my skin felt comfortable & moisturized.

This has a lovely lavender scent. It feels so relaxing to apply this at the end of a long day.

The tube has a foil seal under the cap.

title: PURITO Centella Unscented Cream, Korean Centella, for All Skin Types, Soothing, Facial Cream for face, K-Beauty, Korean Skin Care, 50ml 1.7 fl.oz
date: Reviewed in the United States on May 21, 2024
content: Purito is one of the K-beauty brands that really hit it big with western markets, so you can rest assured that this is a reputable product and company. This is a rebrand of their iconic centella cream, which is great for sensitive skin like mine (notably not conditions like eczema or rosacea. I've gone through the listing and see no mention of it being good for those conditions, so if you have them use at your own discretion). It's a rich cream, which is why I only give it 3 stars for being light weight, something I associate more with gel moisturizers and thinner creams. It spreads easily, so a little seems to go a long way. It doesn't immediately sink into the skin; I can still feel a bit of a residue 15 minutes later. But that makes sense considering that this is aimed at soothing, so longer contact time on the skin and creating a comforting barrier would help. That being said, if you have oily/combo skin this might not be a good AM moisturizer for you (or maybe save it for winter when it's cold and dry). This feels like more of a PM product due to its richness. My skin feels nice and comfortable after using this cream, like it's fully moisturized and soft. It does leave me looking dewy, which is something I know some people don't like. I do also have combo skin, so I'm prone to shine already. Overall, this delivers on its promises and I trust the brand for quality.

title: PURITO Centella Unscented Cream, Korean Centella, for All Skin Types, Soothing, Facial Cream for face, K-Beauty, Korean Skin Care, 50ml 1.7 fl.oz

title: PURITO Centella Unscented Cream, Korean Centella, for All Skin Types, Soothing, Facial Cream for face, K-Beauty, Korean Skin Care, 50ml 1.7 fl.oz
date: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2024
content:
I have sensitive, acne-prone, combination skin. I bought this moisturizer because I was starting a prescription cream that contains tretinoin, and I wanted a moisturizer that was thick and very soothing.

Since starting the tretinoin cream 2 weeks ago, I have had no side effects, and I do believe this product has helped with that.

I wasn't expecting to love this product as much as I do, but its formula is just perfect - while it is very thick, a little goes a long way, and it has a non-greasy finish. My skin looked noticeably better the morning after using this moisturizer even for the first time. It brightens and evens the skin by reducing redness, and it holds in moisture much longer and more effectively than what I was using before. I also really appreciate that it's unscented.

My current routine:
- Vanicream Gentle Cleanser
- Hada Labo Gokujyun Milk
- (Prescription tretinoin cream - every other night)
- Purito Centella Cream w/ 1-2 drops rosehip seed oil

The product that this Purito cream has replaced was Holika Holika's Good Cera Emulsion, which I do still like, but even mixed with rosehip oil, I think it just isn't quite moisturizing or soothing enough to help balance my skin while introducing tret into the routine.

While it's not available on Amazon, I also recommend Purito's unscented centella sunscreen. It's lightweight, hydrating, and truly has no sunscreen smell. This brand has my trust now, and I really hope they maintain their quality standards for years to come.

title: PURITO SEOUL Timeless Bloom Bakuchiol Serum, Korean Jeju Hydrangea, for Sensitive Skin, Ampoule, Fine Line Reduction, Anti Aging Facial Serum for face, K-Beauty, 30ml 1fl.oz

content: Definitely making my skin smoother I would buy it again

title: PURITO SEOUL Timeless Bloom Bakuchiol Serum, Korean Jeju Hydrangea, for Sensitive Skin, Ampoule, Fine Line Reduction, Anti Aging Facial Serum for face, K-Beauty, 30ml 1fl.oz
date: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2024
content:
This is a well-aging serum that I ordered in the summer when tret was doing a number on my skin and my eyes. Bakuchiol is supposed to be a natural alternative to retinols. It is supposed to be a synergistic formula with the bakuchiol and hydrangea working together to smooth skin texture and improve elasticity.

I didn‚Äôt see much of a difference using this serum. Plus it smells like glue and is so thick that I have to use the dropper 3-4 times to get enough out to apply. It‚Äôs over halfway gone and now the dropper doesn‚Äôt fill completely with product. I can tell I‚Äôll be taking the bottle apart or shaking it around to get every last bit. It‚Äôs gentle on my sensitive skin but not worth buying again.

title: PURITO SEOUL Timeless Bloom Bakuchiol Serum, Korean Jeju Hydrangea, for Sensitive Skin, Ampoule, Fine Line Reduction, Anti Aging Facial Serum for face, K-Beauty, 30ml 1fl.oz
date: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2024
content: I love the milky creamy texture, it feels very moisturizing on the skin and not at all tacky. I didn't notice much of a scent to it and if there is it's really faint. My favorite part of this serum is how soft and glowy it makes my skin look. I use it at night but my skin still looks nice and healthy in the morning, I almost don't want to wash it off lol. I haven't notice any anti-aging benefits yet since it will take more time but the plumpness and gentle formula will have me repurchasing!

date: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2024

It has amazing moisturizing properties and performs to my expectations greatly. I like the design of the bottle as it is very easy to dispense and apply however, much you need.

title: PURITO SEOUL Timeless Bloom Bakuchiol Serum, Korean Jeju Hydrangea, for Sensitive Skin, Ampoule, Fine Line Reduction, Anti Aging Facial Serum for face, K-Beauty, 30ml 1fl.oz
date: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2024
content:
Sure, here's a more down-to-earth version:

---

I'm a HUGE fan of most things Korean skincare, and the PURITO SEOUL Timeless Bloom Bakuchiol Serum is another great find. At the time of this review, it's listed at $25 with a 30% off coupon available from the seller. That's a fantastic price for such quality.

The packaging is really pretty and looks great on my vanity shelf. The serum has a light floral fragrance and feels more like a super light lotion, not oily at all. It absorbs easily into my skin. After just my first application, I noticed a significant reduction in skin redness, giving me a more even tone.

Originally, I was going to go with 4 stars, but given the price and wow factor, it's earned 5 stars.

title: PURITO SEOUL Timeless Bloom Bakuchiol Serum, Korean Jeju Hydrangea, for Sensitive Skin, Ampoule, Fine Line Reduction, Anti Aging Facial Serum for face, K-Beauty, 30ml 1fl.oz
date: Reviewed in the United States on June 18, 2024
content: It's nice and feels amazing on the skin, and I've noticed my skin being more plump with consistent use.

date: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2024
content: This serum is great to use at night and makes my face feel smoother and more elastic. A great alternative to the more potentially irritating anti-aging skin care options.

title: PURITO SEOUL Timeless Bloom Bakuchiol Serum, Korean Jeju Hydrangea, for Sensitive Skin, Ampoule, Fine Line Reduction, Anti Aging Facial Serum for face, K-Beauty, 30ml 1fl.oz
date: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2024
content: As someone who has been self-conscious about the fine lines creeping across my forehead, I was thrilled to discover Purito's Timeless Bloom Bakuchiol Serum. This Korean skincare gem harnesses the power of bakuchiol, a plant-based retinol alternative, and the soothing properties of Jeju Hydrangea to deliver a potent anti-aging punch without irritating my sensitive skin. After just a few weeks of consistent use, I noticed a remarkable reduction in the appearance of those pesky fine lines, leaving my forehead smoother and more youthful-looking. The lightweight, fast-absorbing formula seamlessly integrates into my daily routine, providing a luxurious sensorial experience with its delicate floral scent. Purito has truly crafted a game-changer in the world of anti-aging serums, and I can't recommend this product enough for anyone seeking a gentle yet effective solution to combat the signs of aging.

title: PURITO SEOUL Timeless Bloom Bakuchiol Serum, Korean Jeju Hydrangea, for Sensitive Skin, Ampoule, Fine Line Reduction, Anti Aging Facial Serum for face, K-Beauty, 30ml 1fl.oz
date: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2024
content:
This Purito Bakuchiol Timeless Bloom Revitalizing Serum from Korea is a milky liquid that is easy to dispense with the dropper. However it left my skin feeling tacky at first and it took a long time to get absorbed. After it was soaked up it did leave a nice soft and supple feeling which I really appreciate.

I welcome this serum as a retinol alternative my sensitive skin type. I didn't really like the scent, which is very woodsy, but that's is not my highest priority in a skin product.

title: PURITO SEOUL Timeless Bloom Bakuchiol Serum, Korean Jeju Hydrangea, for Sensitive Skin, Ampoule, Fine Line Reduction, Anti Aging Facial Serum for face, K-Beauty, 30ml 1fl.oz
date: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2024
content:
What I like about PURITO SEOUL Bakuchiol Timeless Bloom Revitalizing Serum: The serum is lightweight on my face and did not irritate my skin but did increase my facial redness. My skin feels softer and even though I do not have significant facial wrinkles; the serum has helped my face remain smooth. I try to only use products that are all natural on my face and body which is why I am on the fence with this particular product. The first portion of ingredients are okay but getting into the second portion not so great.

What I dislike about PURITO SEOUL Bakuchiol Timeless Bloom Revitalizing Serum: The serum contains Disodium EDTA which is a chemical that stops blood from coagulating ( we use this in blood specimens in the laboratory); I feel this chemical should not be in a product that is absorbed into the skin as it can be potential harmful. I feel this product has more unnecessary chemical ingredients then I care to use along with the percentage 5.24 of improvement in elasticity is not a significant amount to make me want to continue using the product.

Da fine luglio uso questo siero in combinazione con la crema al retinolo consigliata dallo stesso produttore (Timeless Bloom retinol spot cream), quest‚Äôultima solo alcune sere della settimana.
Dopo pi√π di un mese di utilizzo (entrambe sono agli ‚Äúsgoccioli‚Äù), confermo che √® un‚Äôottima accoppiata.

Questo siero dalla consistenza lattiginosa lascia la pelle molto idratata ed √® idoneo anche per le pelli sensibili come la mia. Infatti, contiene l'1% di Bakuchiol, ingrediente attivo che ha le stesse propriet√† del Retinolo (cio√® favorisce la produzione di collagene) senza i suoi effetti collaterali, e pertanto non determina alcuna irritazione o arrossamento. Al contrario, √® un estratto vegetale derivato dai semi della Psoralea Corylifolia, pianta usata nella medicina orientale proprio per le sue propriet√† anti infiammatorie.
Ne consegue che il siero potenzia gli effetti positivi della crema al retinolo e, nel contempo, previene i possibili effetti negativi (sensibilizzazioni causate dall‚Äôeffetto esfoliante del retinolo).

Risultato: la mia pelle √® ben pi√π liscia e levigata di un mese fa, senza aver patito alcuna controindicazione.
Lo consiglio.

title: PURITO SEOUL Timeless Bloom Bakuchiol Serum, Korean Jeju Hydrangea, for Sensitive Skin, Ampoule, Fine Line Reduction, Anti Aging Facial Serum for face, K-Beauty, 30ml 1fl.oz
date: Reviewed in Germany on June 16, 2024
content:
Bakuchiol gibt es schon l√§nger, doch es hat mich am Anfang nicht interessiert, da der Markt stets mit neuen Wirkstoffen daher kommt.
Noch besser, noch effektiver, noch j√ºnger, noch glatter‚Ä¶.
Ja, die Versprechen sind unendlich.
Durch einen Produkttest(andere Marke) kam ich dann doch zum Bakuchiol und bin absolut begeistert.
Auf die Versprechen jeder Marke achte ich nicht.
Ich achte auf die Inhaltsstoffe und ob das Produkt meiner trockenen Haut gut tut.
Wenn meine trockene Haut gut mit Feuchtigkeit versorgt ist, habe ich weniger Falten und sehe frisch aus.
Au√üerdem achte ich drauf, das Alkohol sehr weit hinten in der Inci Liste steht oder am besten gar nicht vorhanden ist.
Das ist mein Haupt Augenmerk auf ein neues Pflege Produkt.

Nun aber zum Produkt von Purito:
Ich habe schon einige Produkte der Marke Purito ausprobiert und war stets sehr zufrieden.
Beim erste auftragen hat das Serum merkw√ºrdig gerochen.
√Ñhnlich wie Alkohol und mein erste Bef√ºrchtung war, dass ich in den Inhaltsstoffen den Alkohol vielleicht √ºbersehen habe.
Als ich dann noch mal in die Inhaltsstoffe reingeschaut hatte, ist mir aufgefallen, das Butylenglykol an zweiter Stelle steht. Das ist ein zweiwertiger Alkohol und ich war gespannt, wie meine Haut darauf reagiert.
√úberraschenderweise vertrage ich das Serum sehr gut.
Normalerweise spannt meine Haut extrem, wenn z.b Alkohol denat. so weit vorne in der Inci Liste steht.
Doch das ist hier nicht der Fall.
Meine Haut f√ºhlte sich sofort fantastisch an.
Nicht trocken und gut mit Feuchtigkeit versorgt.
Das habe ich selten bei einem Serum.
Ich bin gleich nach der ersten Anwendung mehr als zufrieden.
Meine Haut f√ºhlt sich sofort so gut an, das ich nicht mal ein Nachfolge Produkt verwenden m√ºsste.
Doch auch mit all meinen Cremes vertr√§gt sich das Serum sehr gut.
Der anf√§ngliche Geruch war nur bei der ersten Nutzung und danach nicht mehr da.

Fazit:
Top üëçüèª
Ich bin absolut begeistert, empfehle das Serum gerne weiter und werde es wieder bestellen.

title: PURITO SEOUL Timeless Bloom Bakuchiol Serum, Korean Jeju Hydrangea, for Sensitive Skin, Ampoule, Fine Line Reduction, Anti Aging Facial Serum for face, K-Beauty, 30ml 1fl.oz

title: PURITO SEOUL Timeless Bloom Bakuchiol Serum, Korean Jeju Hydrangea, for Sensitive Skin, Ampoule, Fine Line Reduction, Anti Aging Facial Serum for face, K-Beauty, 30ml 1fl.oz
date: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2024
content:
This is a lovely, high quality, Korean made serum.
It is scent free and feels great on the skin. I experience no irritation, greasiness or dryness.

It absorbs well, feels light weight so that you can still wear makeup afterwards, and has very beneficial ingredients. The 2 top ones being Bakuchiol and Hydrangea.
Hydrangea is an excellent ingredient that hydrates the skin extremely well. I did read that Korean research on hydrangea extract shows that it is very effective at preventing skin photoaging. Pretty neat.

It uses Bakuchiol as opposed to Retinol. A better alternative for those wanting Retinol results but that have dry or sensitive skin. Retinol can be harsh and cause irritation or breakouts.
I still use Retinol but use this every couple of days when I need a Retinol break. This seems to help with the breakouts too since it is a natural antibacterial.
Overall I think this is an impressive, effective serum for a good value.

title: PURITO SEOUL Timeless Bloom Bakuchiol Serum, Korean Jeju Hydrangea, for Sensitive Skin, Ampoule, Fine Line Reduction, Anti Aging Facial Serum for face, K-Beauty, 30ml 1fl.oz

Chiariamolo subito: applicato sulla pelle √® un piacere.
E' un siero dall'aspetto lattiginoso, leggermente denso, che si assorbe per√≤ facilmente ma NON totalmente.

Lascia infatti la pelle quasi umida, leggermente lucida ma NON unta (si tratta comunque di un prodotto a prevalente base acquosa).

La texture della cute, soprattutto nelle parti pi√π sottili e secche appare IMMEDIATAMENTE pi√π compatta, un effetto che √® paragonabile a quello delle creme a base di siliconi anche se, nella formulazione, non ve n'√® traccia.
C'√® per√≤ il tetratilexanato, che √® un emolliente di sintesi e che, sia chiaro, NON √® assolutamente tossico, ma nemmeno per√≤ terapeutico.

Mi spiego meglio: non √® una molecola potenzialmente nociva, ma non apporta neppure alcun vantaggio vero alla pelle.
E' una sorta di solvente che facilita l'emulsione dei grassi (apolari) e dei polari (come le molecole acquose).
Di fatto √® come se "sciogliesse" leggermente la parte grassa/apolare/cheratinica della cute donando immediatamente questo aspetto pi√π liscio e facilitando contestualmente la penetrazione di tutti gli estratti vegetali a seguire che sono polari (acquosi).

E sia chiaro, di estratti vegetali ce n'√® a iosa (lavanda, rosarino, timo..) ma, mi chiedo, serviranno davvero?
Mah..

Io sto provando questo siero da un po' di giorni e, ribadisco, l'effetto COSMETICO, IMMEDIATO, mi piace molto.

Ma da qui a credere che abbia un effetto anti-age ce ne passa..

Io, personalmente, credo pi√π nel retinolo e nei filtri solari e qui, purtroppo, non ve n'√® traccia.

title: PURITO SEOUL Timeless Bloom Retinol Spot Cream, Korean Jeju Hydrangea, for Sensitive Skin, Retinol Cream, Wrinkle Reduction, Anti Aging Face Cream, K-Beauty, 30ml 1fl.oz
date: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2024
content:
Another outstanding K Beauty product! I have been a fan of every product I have tried from Purito and this Timeless Bloom Retinol Spot Cream is another excellent example of the high quality products this company is known for

This spot cream is really convenient for hitting specific areas of the face or hands. It is fragrance free with a medium/heavy weight texture. It absorbs well and I personally experienced no tackiness, redness or irritations from using it. I have dry sensitive skin and this cream felt soothing on my face leaving it soft and smooth in the areas I used it

Consistency with any skin care product is the key to achieving results so don't look for miracles overnight with this or any other retinol product, but if you are willing to do the work you will see improvements

The product comes with a full ingredients list and an expiration date. It contains lots of good stuff like Hydrangea and 1,000 ppms of Retinol. The packaging is very attractive and aesthetically pleasing to look at

I have used Retinol's on and off for many years but I don't use them daily. However, when I use them I always use them at night because the sun and Retinol are not a good mix. I spend very little time in the sun but if you do go in the sun always use sunscreen to protect your skin as Retinol increases your skins sensitivity to it. If you are new to Retinol proceed with only once or twice a week for awhile until you build up a tolerance to it

I definitely recommend this product for any skin type as it's gentle and effective

ALWAYS do a patch test 24 hours before using any new skin care products

title: PURITO SEOUL Timeless Bloom Retinol Spot Cream, Korean Jeju Hydrangea, for Sensitive Skin, Retinol Cream, Wrinkle Reduction, Anti Aging Face Cream, K-Beauty, 30ml 1fl.oz

content:
This retinol cream from PURITO SEOUL is excellent for beginners as it's only 1,000ppm so it won't dry your skin out into a prune. :) It's still quite effective though because it features hydrating ingredients along with the retinoid to help improve crepe-like skin. Results will be seen closer to the 30-day mark since this is a much lower and safer concentration of retinol.

I find using at the two-week mark, my smile lines have tightened in comparison to where they were before so I see a difference but it may not be a linear comparison for others as retinoids take time and consistency to work. I did notice that area of my skin looked more moisturised and plumper so even if it's not as effective on you, you'll get the plumping effect from the moisturising ingredients.

If you're looking to get into K-beauty retinoids and want something good for beginners, this is gentle enough to not fry your face right off. Just make sure to wear sun protection with it on and do NOT mix it with AHA/BHA or vitamin C. :)

content:
This is a review of 'PURITO SEOUL Timeless Bloom Retinol Spot Cream, Korean Jeju Hydrangea, for Sensitive Skin, Retinol Cream, Wrinkle Reduction, Anti Aging Face Cream, K-Beauty, 30ml 1fl.oz'.

This is a retinol cream, I got this to use as an eye and neck wrinkle cream. it's quite gentle for a retinol but you should probably still introduce it carefully as retinol can be harsh on the skin depending on how sensitive it is. I also like that they included soothing and moisturising ingredients. This feels slightly thicker than most eye area creams I've tried and I like this because it helps the area to feel moisturised for longer. This is meant to be good for wrinkles due to the retinol and bakuchiol which are popular skincare ingredients, but it also contains hydrangea extract which I didn't know but apparently it's good for wrinkles too. Overall I really like this cream, I do think it is slightly overpriced being a retinol cream but it is a korean skincare product which tend to cost more on amazon due to the cost of importing and it will last a long time if used on the eye area as you only need a small amount.

Ich habe die Creme auf und bei ersten F√§ltchen im Augen- und Stirnbereich benutzt und konnte nach ca. einw√∂chiger Anwendung Verbesserungen in Form von glattere und prallerer Haut bemerken.

Ich benutze die Creme ausschlie√ülich abends und nutze morgens einen Sonnenschutz mit Lichtschutzfaktor 50+.

I was looking for an anti-aging cream that has no artificial perfumes inside so I decided to give this cream a try and so far - I am happy with my order.

I use this retinol anti-aging cream as a remedy for the skin around my eyes and so far I quite like it.

The cream has a very mild, neutral scent which I appreciate as I don't tolerate well heavily-scented cosmetics. The cream is easy to apply and it has more of a thicker texture which means that one needs really a tiny amount for the skin around their eyes.

The cream absorbs really quickly, doesn't leave a sticky or oily residue, and has a matte effect to it.

My skin tolerates it well but I would suggest to do a patch test-first.

I use this cream as part of my night-care skin routine and I follow with a hydrating cream afterwards.

title: PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella Spot Patch, Korean Centella, for Sensitive Skin, Soothing, Pimple Patches for Face, Spot Stickers, K-Beauty, 51 Count
date: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2024
content:
These spot patches from PURITO SEOUL are so good for stubborn overnight marks on the face (the red volcanoes of doom) as they stay on all night long and end up as flat skin in the morning. They suck up every last bit of gunk from the skin and leave a flat red area that will repair itself quickly. :)

I think the added Centella ingredient did a very good job in these patches because I saw a lot fewer red areas in the red pore volcanoes I stuck each patch on. They're strong and stayed on all night after tossing and turning so the adhesion is excellent. Additionally, there are two sizes in this set; 12mm for jumbo spots and 10mm for normal areas. This isn't something I usually see so I'm glad they're making spot patches for the larger areas now.

I think overall, this is well worth the money because I saw results overnight when applying to areas that needed to get the gunk sucked out of them. I like them a lot and will be reordering when I run out!

title: PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella Spot Patch, Korean Centella, for Sensitive Skin, Soothing, Pimple Patches for Face, Spot Stickers, K-Beauty, 51 Count

They still soak up all that disgustingness super well, comparable to the other, super popular ones for patches. I am a bit skeptical when it comes to the brightening ingredients used. title: PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella Spot Patch, Korean Centella, for Sensitive Skin, Soothing, Pimple Patches for Face, Spot Stickers, K-Beauty, 51 Count
date: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2024
content: These are very good pimple patches. Korean, which tend to put out excellent skincare products. These acne patches have a bit of a different look to them than the other more generic pimple patches out there. (see photo) These- you can just tell are higher quality than the typical pimple patches available. Also, these are Centella (plant) based, the other pimple patches out there don't typically list that as an ingredient. Better quality and "different," also means you get a smaller number of patches per box. 51 in this case. They stick onto the skin perfectly, are almost unnoticeable "on", and mute pimples well when you are wearing them. You can see the sticker if you look closely so I'm not quite certain I would wear them in the daytime still. Overnight is preferable to me. They are very comfortable to wear, you hardly can feel them at all, have caused me no irritation. I use them overnight (as I said) mostly, to reduce redness and swelling in any pimples that come up. They won't get rid of the pimple, but they will improve it. Make it easier to cover up the next day, and shorten the duration of the blemish. You want to be sure to not use your fingernail to scrape up the edge of the sticker, when you are getting ready to place it, because it will curl up the edge, and then the pimple patch will be more visible on your face. This is why they split the plastic backing down the center of each pimple patch, so you can pull it off carefully that way and not curl the edges of the sticker. I think these pimple treatments are excellent, I struggled with cystic acne through my teen years, and these would have made a huge difference for me in those years, I'm mid-life and I'm still having to treat random pimples, and these patches are one of the best discoveries I've come across for that in recent years.

title: PURITO Deep Sea Cream, Hydration, Lightweight, for All Skin Types, Daily Face Moisturizer, Vegan & Cruelty-Free, Korean Skin Care, 50ml 1.69fl.oz
date: Reviewed in the United States on June 3, 2024
content:
When I ordered this Purito HydroWave deep sea cream I was expecting a straightforward moisturizer but there is more than that going on with this product. It also contains alcohol and niacinamide. I prefer my skin care products to have no alcohol and a low percentage of niacinamide, only because I have dry, aging skin which those ingredients can irritate.

I was pleasantly surprised to find that this product is not drying to my skin and actually feels very soothing. It seems that the 60% seawater, Allantoin, and sodium hyaluronate provide enough hydration and soothing to balance out the drying ingredients.

End result-my skin really seems to love this stuff. After an evening application and a good night's sleep my skin looks positively dewy and healthy in the morning.

To me the best thing about this hydro wave cream is that it can do some repair work on my skin (due to the niacinamide) while also hydrating and not irritating my skin. That has been a hard balance to find. Given that discovery I will continue to use this product nightly and if increased benefits are evident I will definitely reorder.

title: PURITO Deep Sea Cream, Hydration, Lightweight, for All Skin Types, Daily Face Moisturizer, Vegan & Cruelty-Free, Korean Skin Care, 50ml 1.69fl.oz
date: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2024
content:
I give this product 3 stars overall, would recommend to others and would repurchase myself again.

This product is something I am repurchasing again actually, from the original Deep Sea Water Cream which has been come out with new packaging in 2024. I contacted Purito customer service directly via email to confirm that this was just a brand repackaging (new look), and not actually a reformulation of the product itself. They confirmed there is no change to the ingredients, so I repurchased it. I really loved the original moisturizer and wanted to get this one too on the amazon prime day sale.

When I first got it, I wanted to make sure I was getting the real product (sometimes products on amazon can be fake) and this is in fact, real. I noticed that the tube itself seemed a bit lighter than the original tube.
The only con with this product and the reason why I gave 3 stars is because if you notice very carefully, when you hold it up to the light, you can see that there is some empty space in the tube, so it's actually not completed filled up with the product. I was disappointed, because I've seen this happening more in everything (like even chip bags, am I paying for air or chips?! lol) and so around 1/5 of it seems to be emtpy, you can't see the product is there when holding it up to the light. Try to see with your own product if you buy as your phone camera may not be able to do it justice.

Besides that flaw (maybe it was just my batch that had a little extra air and other tubes were fine), the product itself is spectacular. For oily skin, I like that it is so light-weight and gel-like almost, but is still hydrating and doesn't leave my skin dry. This is perfect for spring/summertime, for winter may need a little more oomph.

Overall, I will keep repurchasing this as my daily moisturizer and would recommend for others as well.

title: PURITO Hydro Wave Deep Sea Serum, 60 mL / 2.02 fl. oz., Hydrating Face Serum, Lightweight & Non-Greasy, Skin Moisture Boost, Korean Skincare, For Sensitive Skin, Hyaluronic Acid & Deep Sea Water
date: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2024
content:
Washed my face, used a Purito toner, then applied this serum. Went on smoothly, absorbed/dried quickly, face felt moisturizer, but not nearly as moisturizing as my other face lotion. I wasn't expecting much from nonsense that claimed to contain Deep Sea Water from exactly 605 meter down. I mean really, I thought, "Serious quackery. What effect could DSW have on someone's face anyway?" Pfft.

An hour or so later a friend came over and right away mentioned how good my face looked (only second time he has ever done so and coincidently the other time was after using Purito Toner). I asked him to expand on the compliment (strictly for sake of this review...well, and my ego) and he said it looked healthier and slightly "glowy."

Next day, I did a little test on my hands. I applied/patted in a narrow strip down the back of each hand. [FYI-I'm over 60, with well-abused, dry hands.] An hour later I looked at my hands, and there before my eyes were two visibly less wrinkled, "glowy" narrow strips running down the length of both hands.

I've done this little test for years with just about every lotion/serum/oil/etc., I've used. None showed much of anything after a full hour - maybe a little temporary hydration and plumping lasting about 10 minutes. However, the results of this little test were almost enough to make me a believer.

Still being a pure skeptic at heart, I decided to do a google scholar search re DSW and effects on skin and discovered what I thought to be utter nonsense actually has some scientific merit to it. Look it up the medical literature for yourself. Drinking pure DSW (not this serum - disclaimer for the T supporters amongst us) showed benefits as well.

I'm going to continuing to use this product to see if there are any long-term noticeable improvement(s). Will try to remember to update in 6 months with those results.

For now given what I've seen, a definite Buy

title: PURITO Hydro Wave Deep Sea Serum, 60 mL / 2.02 fl. oz., Hydrating Face Serum, Lightweight & Non-Greasy, Skin Moisture Boost, Korean Skincare, For Sensitive Skin, Hyaluronic Acid & Deep Sea Water

It does have a fresh, watery scent, but is barely detectable and might be okay for some people who don‚Äôt care for fragrances. I don‚Äôt mind scents, although some break me out. It spreads easily on skin with a cooling sensation, and is very lightweight but hydrating. This is a good hydrating product for people who have dry skin but don‚Äôt like the feel of heavier products, or are also prone to breaking out from heavy skincare products.

The only thing I don‚Äôt care for about it is that it doesn‚Äôt seem to fully dry down and leaves a slightly tacky texture on my face, especially when used in combination with other ‚Äústicky‚Äù products. It isn‚Äôt a problem at night, but can cause makeup to pill up over it, so it‚Äôs not a suitable moisturizer for the morning.

title: PURITO Hydro Wave Deep Sea Serum, 60 mL / 2.02 fl. oz., Hydrating Face Serum, Lightweight & Non-Greasy, Skin Moisture Boost, Korean Skincare, For Sensitive Skin, Hyaluronic Acid & Deep Sea Water
date: Reviewed in the United States on July 5, 2023
content: The serum doesn't have any noticeable scent. It has a gel watery like consistency. It smooths on easily and doesn't leave skin feeling greasy or tacky. It left my skin feeling soft and hydrated. It is very hot currently and I found the serum hydrating enough that I didn't need to layer on another moisturizer.

title: PURITO Hydro Wave Deep Sea Serum, 60 mL / 2.02 fl. oz., Hydrating Face Serum, Lightweight & Non-Greasy, Skin Moisture Boost, Korean Skincare, For Sensitive Skin, Hyaluronic Acid & Deep Sea Water
date: Reviewed in the United States on July 5, 2023
content:
This serum definitely looks the part of being moisturizing, and including sea water, as I get an ocean vibe just looking at the product. It comes in a clear bottle so you can see how much product is still inside, and has a convenient pump at the top to administer just the amount that you need.
The serum itself is light and goes on smoothly without being sticky or heavy. It takes a little bit of time to seep into your skin, but once it does it is not noticeable other than the fact that skin feels really hydrated. I mostly use this at night as a deep moisturizer, and do not follow up with a lotion afterwards because this does the trick. I think it's perfect for the hot summer months because while my skin still needs moisturization, I don't like using thick heavy products when it's hot out. This is cool and refreshing, and is perfect for light long lasting moisture.
I always appreciate when I find cruelty free beauty products that also care about the environment. It's great to see beauty brands doing their part to create safer products. I was also impressed by the addition of the snow mushroom capsules in the serum, as I have never had the pleasure of using that ingredient before. I did find that they added to the moisturizing properties of this serum, and made it more enjoyable to use.

title: PURITO Hydro Wave Deep Sea Serum, 60 mL / 2.02 fl. oz., Hydrating Face Serum, Lightweight & Non-Greasy, Skin Moisture Boost, Korean Skincare, For Sensitive Skin, Hyaluronic Acid & Deep Sea Water
date: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2023
content: This stuff moisturizes so good my face was glowing all day.

title: PURITO Hydro Wave Deep Sea Serum, 60 mL / 2.02 fl. oz., Hydrating Face Serum, Lightweight & Non-Greasy, Skin Moisture Boost, Korean Skincare, For Sensitive Skin, Hyaluronic Acid & Deep Sea Water
date: Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2023
content:
This has no scent. It's moisturizing! I tried this without following with a cream or moisturizer just to get a sense of how I react to it.

It's not gel-like. More like water. Or perhaps a thin, watery, gel-like consistency is more accurate. It feels very wet once applied. After patting it onto my face, it absorbed fairly quickly. My skin felt plumper and more "bouncy". I know, it's an odd description but having patted my skin to apply, it makes sense.

There was no need for a moisturizer. There was no tightness. In fact, it felt like it was well hydrated. There was a nice glow left on my skin from the serum. And not due to shimmer or glitter, as this is completely clear.

In short, it's wonderful!

title: PURITO Hydro Wave Deep Sea Serum, 60 mL / 2.02 fl. oz., Hydrating Face Serum, Lightweight & Non-Greasy, Skin Moisture Boost, Korean Skincare, For Sensitive Skin, Hyaluronic Acid & Deep Sea Water
date: Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2023
content:
It is a clear gel, and though lightweight, non oily, and unscented, it does take a while to absorb, so I will not wear this during the day under makeup.
I'm adding this to my night routine, over any serum with strong actives. It is deeply hydrating and will seal in any moisture or actives.
I love that it is not fragranced as well. Overall, a very effective moisturizing serum and non irritating.

title: PURITO Mighty Bamboo Panthenol Cream, Glow Cream, Skin Barrier Repair, for All Skin Types, Daily Face Moisturizer, Glass skin, Vegan & Cruelty-Free, Korean Skin Care 3.38fl.oz / 100ml
date: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2024
content:
This moisturizer is definitely doing its job. Its definitely soothing and hydrating. If I put it on dry skin I definitely find it sticky. If I put it on immediately after washing my face, Its perfect. I dont get any stickiness if i do it that way. Just wetting your skin first and patting it with a towel before applying this moisturizer would also be a solution, as well. I have very sensitive and reactive skin and this hasnt given me any issues. I'll update once I've used it for a longer period of time.

Edit Update 11/30/24
I've been enjoying this moisturizer for the last month but my bottle is almost empty so I went ahead and purchased the new version with Bamboo extract and the new packaging. The formulation is slightly different, though the only ingredient addition is bamboo extract (as far as I know). My skin looks 100 percent matte with this version, whereas the previous one left behind a healthy glow. I'm not sure which effect I prefer. Matte finish certainly looks more natural. I also have noticed that the previous version had a very refreshing, cooling effect upon application and the experience seems to be missing from the new formulation, which is disappointing. After applying, I also noticed some flakiness on my forehead. I dont know if it's because I started using the mighty bamboo face wash a few days ago and its dehydrating, or if it's the recent turn to cold weather. I'll update again now that I'm using the new formulations, as it has only been a couple of days. So far, I can still safely say I haven't had any inflammation, irritation, redness, itchines, reactions, or acne while using these products. That alone is five stars for me.
LAST UPDATE: PLEASE BRING BACK THE OLD FORMULATION PLEEEEEASE. These products started sensitizing my skin. I do have a grass allergy so the bamboo addition may have ruined it for me. Got temporary red, itchy, bumpy patches on my face multiple times. The reactions ceased as soon as I stopped using the new versions of these products. So disappointed.

title: PURITO Mighty Bamboo Panthenol Cream, Glow Cream, Skin Barrier Repair, for All Skin Types, Daily Face Moisturizer, Glass skin, Vegan & Cruelty-Free, Korean Skin Care 3.38fl.oz / 100ml
date: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2022
content:
This is my go-to moisturizer, but it wasn't love at first sight. First time I used it, I hated how sticky it was and once it sunk in, it wasn't nearly moisturizing enough for my dry skin.

BUT after playing around with it, this stuff is amazing. I apply a lot, about a quarter size, and spread on my face and neck. Then I give it a minute or two to sink in. I've never had such soft skin with no greasiness. The trick is to put on a thick layer and let it sink in.

It's helped with my redness too, though not overnight.

I agree with some of the other reviewers, this actually may not be the best option for an impaired skin barrier, despite the way its marketed. I had some sensitivity after experimenting with exfoliating acids and this definitely stung. No idea what ingredient would cause that though.

Oddly, I would still agree with the claim that this is skin barrier strengthening. I have definitely noticed my skin is much healthier in almost every way.

Rating 4 stars because it definitely takes some getting used to and this may not be the best option for an impaired skin barrier even though that seems to be who it is marketed for.

content: This stuff is so overhyped it's insane. First of all, it's not as moisturizing as influencers claim it is. This product does in fact have a large ingredient list, and it clogged MANY of my pores. At first I wasn't sure if the clogged pores I got were from this product, so I only applied it on my forehead for a week. And now I have whiteheads and closed comedones on my forehead. I'm extremely disappointed. I was really hoping this product would help heal my acne, but instead it just made it worse. literally just buy Vani cream or Aveeno facial moisturizers.
