title: PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion #21 Light Beige, Foundation, Korean Centella, Makeup Long Lasting, Flawless Coverage, K-Beauty, 15g, 0.52 fl.oz
date: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2024

title: PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion #21 Light Beige, Foundation, Korean Centella, Makeup Long Lasting, Flawless Coverage, K-Beauty, 15g, 0.52 fl.oz
date: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2024
content: I have tried a couple cushion foundations from various Kbeauty brands. Given my usual inclination towards fuller coverage and matte finishes, I wasn't sure I would like this in terms of performance as much as the tirtir cushion, which serves as my baseline for comfort to coverage. I think this is a great everyday in-between and have been using it as such. I have very textured, oily, acne prone skin and this is able to cover my dark discoloration spots and redness without any issue in a very thing, comfortable layer. This is definitely not as matte as the tirtir but it also has less of a thick feel to it and after a day out, I look shiny but not unbearably so. With maybe 2 powder touch ups throughout the day, I can maintain it at matte or semi-matte. Overall very impressed with this foundation because I don't normally look for calming or good for skin claims when shopping makeup. That all aside, this still works for me and is currently my daily foundation.

title: PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion #21 Light Beige, Foundation, Korean Centella, Makeup Long Lasting, Flawless Coverage, K-Beauty, 15g, 0.52 fl.oz
date: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2024
content:
This comes in a nice outer product box. It‚Äôs sealed. It‚Äôs made in Korea. It says it‚Äôs cruelty free, vegan, no synthetic fragrance, gentle ingredients, and earth conscious. It looked like they didn‚Äôt have an ingredient list in English, but then I saw that the inside of the box had the ingredients in English, and they‚Äôre also in English on the refill pack. There‚Äôs also an expiration date listed on the box and bottom of the compact.

The compact is nice. It isn‚Äôt too thick or bulky (which a lot of cushion compacts can be, so it‚Äôs nice when they aren‚Äôt).

I got this in the shade #23 Natural Beige. Usually with K-Beauty foundations I go for a shade 13 or 21. I was hoping #23 wouldn‚Äôt be too dark for my very fair skin. It looked like it might be given the product photos - it looked really dark, especially for K-Beauty. But, usually K-Beauty products are pretty light and I can make #23 shades work, so I was hoping that was going to be the case with this. Fortunately, it looks a lot darker in the product photos than it is in person. In the cushion, it looks pretty dark, but actually swatched and applied, it looks much lighter (see my swatch photos - taken in indirect natural light and direct natural light). So, thankfully, I was able to make this work. But, if the brand offers a shade 21 or 13, that would be much better for me.

I have dry skin. When it‚Äôs warmer, my skin is more dry to normal and in the winter my skin gets extremely dry. I prefer to use a foundation that isn‚Äôt drying but still sets on its own so I don‚Äôt need to use powder. This claimed to be a semi-matte finish, so I was hoping it would set on its own but not be too drying for my dry skin. This isn‚Äôt what I‚Äôd call a semi-matte finish. I‚Äôd call it more of a natural finish. With my dry skin I prefer not to use powder, and without powder, in order for my makeup to last as long as possible, I need it to set on its own, or at least mostly set on its own. This sets down enough where it wears well throughout the day. But, it doesn‚Äôt set down to what I‚Äôd call a semi-matte finish. It has a subtle glow to it. Not glowy where I‚Äôd call it a dewy finish, but not semi-matte either. It‚Äôs a kind of natural, subtle glow like healthy skin.

This applies nicely. The included applicator works well, but it also applies easily with my own sponge (like a beauty blender) or brush. When using a cushion foundation, it‚Äôs always important not to press too much into the cushion. You can end up with a ton of product on the sponge. I just lightly press it into the cushion (just barely pressing down) and then I take the sponge and dab it onto my skin. I don‚Äôt swipe at all. I just press it into the skin. Doing this gives me nice, smooth, even coverage. A very thin layer gives okay coverage (covers my redness and small post acne marks) and looks like skin. I was able to build it up a little in areas where I needed more coverage (like where I have sun spots).

This didn‚Äôt feel dry on the skin at all. Like I said, it has a natural finish to it. It sets down almost completely. Without powdering my face, it does transfer some if I touch my face. But it doesn‚Äôt transfer much aside from when I touch my face. If I use setting spray, it doesn‚Äôt transfer at all. The rest of my makeup applied nicely over this. This lasted all day long without leaving my skin looking or feeling dry.

Overall, I really like this. The shade wasn‚Äôt the best match, but I was able to make it work. I would definitely purchase this if they have a lighter shade. I tried to see if they offered one, but couldn‚Äôt find it. If you‚Äôre looking for a cushion foundation that gives nice, buildable coverage, goes smoothly on and looks like skin, doesn‚Äôt feel or look dry but sets on its own to a smooth, natural finish, then I‚Äôd recommend this.

title: PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion #21 Light Beige, Foundation, Korean Centella, Makeup Long Lasting, Flawless Coverage, K-Beauty, 15g, 0.52 fl.oz
date: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2024
content:
I'm really impressed with this product! It's super easy to use, and I love that it comes with a refill! That makes it more like $15 than $30--which is so good for foundation. I might be a little biased, though, because this is the closest skin tone match I've ever gotten with foundation, so I was so blown away by that.

In addition, though, this foundation lasted all day, and it didn't get a cracked look to it. It also didn't give me that *foundation-makeup* look that a lot of products do. It looked a lot more natural. It also came off immediately with a makeup remover! Hopefully this product is never discontinued because it's going to be a staple in my makeup collection for as long as I can manage it.

title: PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion #21 Light Beige, Foundation, Korean Centella, Makeup Long Lasting, Flawless Coverage, K-Beauty, 15g, 0.52 fl.oz
date: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2024
content:
Review for: PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion #23 Natural Beige, Foundation, Korean Centella, Makeup Long Lasting, Flawless Coverage, K-Beauty, 15g, 0.52 fl.oz

Okay so... when it comes to skin makeup I am usually one of the lightest 3ish shades in whatever line of products. So this is a bit dark for me. That's my own fault.

As far as a foundation in general this is everything I would want. It is light enough to not feel cakey but goes on smoothly enough to cover what I need to to cover. The finish is "dewy" as per most K-beauty brands. It's super easy to use, and it came with an extra refill which was great. If you're looking for an affordable K-beauty foundation I wouldn't hesitate to recommend this one... if you can get it in your color.

title: PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion #21 Light Beige, Foundation, Korean Centella, Makeup Long Lasting, Flawless Coverage, K-Beauty, 15g, 0.52 fl.oz
date: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2024
content: I've been wanting to try cushion creams for a while, and this one worked well! I love Purito's Wonder Releaf Unscented Centella Serum, and was excited to try something with the same skincare properties in a cushion cream. It comes with the compact, a sponge, and a refill. The shade is too light for me as someone who is light-medium, so I would recommend this for people who have a light complexion. The formula is a satin finish and it has medium coverage. I thought it was a little too cakey when I used their provided sponge, so I used my foundation brush to apply the cushion cream for more natural coverage. The scent is pretty strong, so if you're sensitive to scents this might not be as good for you. Overall, I think this would be a good product if you're looking for a medium coverage, satin foundation.

title: PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion #21 Light Beige, Foundation, Korean Centella, Makeup Long Lasting, Flawless Coverage, K-Beauty, 15g, 0.52 fl.oz

content: So this cushion foundation is great. I think that it's great quality and I find that these types of cushion foundations apply. Very smooth on the skin are very high coverage and just our skin friendly my problem with this though is that not only with this specific Amazon product but with cushion foundation, especially, the actual color or shade of the cushion foundation is lighter than it shows on the Amazon product and that is the case with this product. It's a little lighter so if you are a tan girl like me, it's better if you go a shade darker.

title: PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion #21 Light Beige, Foundation, Korean Centella, Makeup Long Lasting, Flawless Coverage, K-Beauty, 15g, 0.52 fl.oz

title: PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion #21 Light Beige, Foundation, Korean Centella, Makeup Long Lasting, Flawless Coverage, K-Beauty, 15g, 0.52 fl.oz
date: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2024
content: This is a nice foundation with buildable coverage. It goes on smoothly and is super light weight. I am very happy with it. The color is just a little bit lighter than expected. I do recommend it.

title: PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion #21 Light Beige, Foundation, Korean Centella, Makeup Long Lasting, Flawless Coverage, K-Beauty, 15g, 0.52 fl.oz
date: Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2024
content:
I was really excited to try this product, but after several uses I am not a fan.
Pros:
- The product as high-quality packaging including a nice compact that includes a mirror and a sponge.
- An extra refill sponge is also included.
- The product is easy to apply.
Cons:
- I didn't feel like this product lasted on my skin as long as it should. For me it started wearing off after about an hour.
- I didn't care for the way the product settled on my pores and wrinkles. To me the product seemed to accentuate the problem areas on my face rather than cover them. :(
- The above problem also made it hard for me to remove what was left of the product off my face.

content: I'm a neutral, warm neutral. This was the worst decision I made. Made me look like I was a ghost. I will "try" to make this work because this was so expensive! But it does make my skin look kinda smooth.

title: PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion #21 Light Beige, Foundation, Korean Centella, Makeup Long Lasting, Flawless Coverage, K-Beauty, 15g, 0.52 fl.oz
date: Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2024
content: If you like medium coverage foundation that doesn't dry the skin, this is a great one. It's compact, easy to travel with and provides very nice coverage without being thick and drying. Cushion foundations are perfect for people who want coverage without te messiness of a typical foundation. I like this one because it gives me the redness coverage that I want but it also doesn't dry out my skin or feel thick on my skin. The shade match was nice as well, once I blended it out, it was a great shade on me. It looks yellow on my hand, but blended out nicely and matched me. I have fair skin with pink undertones and lots of redness and it worked well on me. Overall, I'm pleased.

title: PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion #21 Light Beige, Foundation, Korean Centella, Makeup Long Lasting, Flawless Coverage, K-Beauty, 15g, 0.52 fl.oz

The sponge that it came with is soft and helps me blend the foundation easily. Overall, I recommend this product!

I didn't use the sponge but instead used a brush intended for cream foundations. It looks so nice on and feels great, very lightweight! It covered nicely but not heavy. It's easy to toss in my bag for touch ups on the go and I'll use the sponge for that. Good price point considering you also get a refill.

title: PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion #21 Light Beige, Foundation, Korean Centella, Makeup Long Lasting, Flawless Coverage, K-Beauty, 15g, 0.52 fl.oz

content: Unfortunately this wasn't a good shade for either me or my daughter. It went on nicely but I didn't leave it on because I didn't like the color.

title: PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion #21 Light Beige, Foundation, Korean Centella, Makeup Long Lasting, Flawless Coverage, K-Beauty, 15g, 0.52 fl.oz

I see a lot of good reviews for this so it could be this is just my experience but this felt like it pointed big arrows at any dry spots/patches that existed on my face. Like arrows so big you could see them from space kinda thing ü´£

My skin fluctuates because it has a complex pattern to it, some areas are more oily than others, more dry, etc etc. so I don‚Äôt think I will get this again. Also I would recommend using your own sponge or brush if you don‚Äôt want the application process to feel long and tiresome.

title: PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion #21 Light Beige, Foundation, Korean Centella, Makeup Long Lasting, Flawless Coverage, K-Beauty, 15g, 0.52 fl.oz
date: Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2024
content: I like the smooth application properties and the full coverage. It is super lightweight on my skin and I have had no issues layering my other skin care products with this. No adverse reactions. I‚Äôm happy with the performance and lasting results.

title: PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion #21 Light Beige, Foundation, Korean Centella, Makeup Long Lasting, Flawless Coverage, K-Beauty, 15g, 0.52 fl.oz
date: Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2024
content: This is excellent and blends really well. Comes with a second replacement sponge full of additional makeup (without the second one, it might not be quite worth the price). Easy to use but it can be a little bit messy since it‚Äôs a liquid cream and can get everywhere if you‚Äôre not careful. It dries shortly after application and does not smudge off easily. Container is sturdy, comes with a small built-in mirror and snaps shut.

title: PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion #21 Light Beige, Foundation, Korean Centella, Makeup Long Lasting, Flawless Coverage, K-Beauty, 15g, 0.52 fl.oz
date: Reviewed in the United States on June 21, 2024
content: I am super impressed with this foundation. First, the color is a perfect match to my complexion. The foundation applies so easy with the included sponge or a brush and it just blends effortlessly. Usually, these cushion foundations leave my skin feeling dry and settle on lines and pores but this one doesn‚Äôt, it just makes my skin look perfected and the final result is very natural. It lasts all day on my dry skin. This one really has a lovely finish and has won my heart, better than most very high end designer cushion foundations I have tried in the past. I am really looking forward to keep using this and can‚Äôt recommend enough.

title: PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion #21 Light Beige, Foundation, Korean Centella, Makeup Long Lasting, Flawless Coverage, K-Beauty, 15g, 0.52 fl.oz
date: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2024
content:
I've been into K Beauty for about a decade. I've seen these foundation cushions for a long time and was excited to finally try one. I appreciate that they come with a refill and for the money, I think these give you a generous amount of product.
Despite this shade being way too yellow for me, I'm trying to review this fairly. The lightness of the foundation seemed right, the undertone is just very yellow. The foundation itself has a strange chalk/powder like finish that accentuates texture you didn't know you had. I'm really surprised how terrible this is for texture. It really will show every nook and cranny.
I've used other Purito products and enjoyed them, but this won't be joining their ranks.

title: PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion #21 Light Beige, Foundation, Korean Centella, Makeup Long Lasting, Flawless Coverage, K-Beauty, 15g, 0.52 fl.oz
date: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2024
content: I like to keep my makeup to a nice neutral look. This provided very nice coverage without an overly done look. It wasn't cakey and didn't sink into creases. I love it.

title: PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion #21 Light Beige, Foundation, Korean Centella, Makeup Long Lasting, Flawless Coverage, K-Beauty, 15g, 0.52 fl.oz
date: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2024
content:
I was nervous this PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion #21 Light Beige would be too light for me - as I‚Äôm typically a Buff Beige. But I‚Äôve learned from TirTir to go down at least 1-2 shades since the foundation oxidizes and ends up going on darker.

I‚Äôm a fan of TirTir but sometimes it‚Äôs just TOO much coverage for me and doesn‚Äôt always looks amazing on me. This Purito Seoul is definitely more of a medium coverage, but looks WAY better on my skin than TT does. It doesn‚Äôt seep into my pores or fine lines, and blends into my skin perfectly!

Love that it comes with a refill as well! I was pleasantly surprised to see that! And a little goes a long way, so the original and refill in this pack will last a LONG time!!

title: PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion #21 Light Beige, Foundation, Korean Centella, Makeup Long Lasting, Flawless Coverage, K-Beauty, 15g, 0.52 fl.oz
date: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2024
content: Wow - blown away by this product. Not only does it apply easily, but my complexion looked smooth and flawless after applying - the kind of look you would typically use photoshop or a filter to achieve! It is easy to apply and soothing on delicate facial skin. Plus - it comes with a refill and extra applicator puff! Thrilled with this Wonder Releaf Foundation. Highly Recommend. 5 Stars.

title: PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion #21 Light Beige, Foundation, Korean Centella, Makeup Long Lasting, Flawless Coverage, K-Beauty, 15g, 0.52 fl.oz
date: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2024
content: The PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion in #13 Neutral Ivory offers flawless coverage and long-lasting makeup, true to its K-Beauty promise. The centella-infused formula provides a natural finish and is gentle on the skin. It's a great choice for those seeking a lightweight foundation with skincare benefits from Korean beauty trends.

title: PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion #21 Light Beige, Foundation, Korean Centella, Makeup Long Lasting, Flawless Coverage, K-Beauty, 15g, 0.52 fl.oz
date: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2024
content:
Firstly, I gave this product 2 stars solely based on the packaging and not on the actual foundation. For the foundation itself, I would rate 0 stars.

Pros:
- Packaging is a beautiful compact container with mirror and puff included and very high quality with a luxury feel.
- The product comes with an extra refill sponge which is great
- Easy to apply
- Fairly lightweight to apply
- A little bit of product goes a long way
- Good Coverage while it lasts
- Matches my skin tone well...I have a very fair ivory skin tone
- Seems to have some pretty good ingredients
- Only causes minor breakouts (I have sensitive, acne-prone skin)
- Good Value for the price if it worked

Cons:
-Emphasises dry patches
-Not transfer proof
-Breaks down fast (max 2 hrs)
-Emphasises enlarged pores and wrinkles since the product settles in them.
-Has a gross way of filling in wrinkles almost as if someone used a yellow-brown piece of floss and put it in the wrinkles lines. The product is not yellow on me at first but I'm assuming it oxidizes with time to become yellow as it sits in my wrinkles
-When I take it off, I have difficulty getting it out of my pores. I have to scrub my skin and wash it multiple times to get it out. I have large pores in my T-zone.
-The sponge is not a good idea hygiene-wise. Sponges can harbor and breed loads of bacteria especially when you use the same applicator (the included puff) to dab on the sponge, it adds bacteria every time. The company does not mention what if anything has been done to the sponge to prevent the growth of bacteria.
-I wish they had a description written on the refill sponge packaging since I almost tore open the sealed pouch without realizing that it was a refill.
-The included applicator puff is not the best but that is to be expected

Overall, I would love to love and recommend this product but I can't at least not for my specific skin. If someone has skin that is uncomplicated and unwrinkled with tiny pores this MIGHT be the right foundation for you but then why bother with a foundation at all if the skin is already perfect?

title: PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion #21 Light Beige, Foundation, Korean Centella, Makeup Long Lasting, Flawless Coverage, K-Beauty, 15g, 0.52 fl.oz
date: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2024
content: The purito cica bb cream is my all time favorite foundation ever. I have pretty dry skin so it is hard to find a dependable foundation. But anytime I need my makeup to be perfect I always choose my purito. So I was very excited to try another bb cream from them that has a more natural to matte finish. This gives me pretty full coverage weather I use the included puff or a damp sponge. But the best part is that it looks very skin like even though it's high coverage. It lasts all day and I haven't had any problems using powder products right on top without setting first. I wouldn't say this has replaced my favorite but it's definitely a close runner up. I know it'll for sure be my go to when traveling.

title: PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion #21 Light Beige, Foundation, Korean Centella, Makeup Long Lasting, Flawless Coverage, K-Beauty, 15g, 0.52 fl.oz
date: Reviewed in the United States on June 18, 2024
content:
It's very lightweight, feels like I'm not wearing any foundation.
Easy to carry around and it comes with an extra foundation sponge to pop in when you're done with one.

title: PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion #21 Light Beige, Foundation, Korean Centella, Makeup Long Lasting, Flawless Coverage, K-Beauty, 15g, 0.52 fl.oz
date: Reviewed in the United States on June 18, 2024
content:
Very sheer coverage. The consistency is very liquid and almost feels like water. I used the cushion to pat onto my skin but the liquid bled through the cushion on the first day. Even after 3 layers, the coverage was still medium-sheer but blurred the imperfections. I normally wear a full coverage CC liquid or cream and Purito Seoul BB Cream cushion does not come close to that coverage. It did have some water-resistance when fresh but my oily skin eventually pushed it all to the surface and it wiped off easily.

I ordered for a quick application for evening outings. No SPF so I will not wear during the day but I will take it on my upcoming vacation to get a little coverage for dinner.

title: PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion #21 Light Beige, Foundation, Korean Centella, Makeup Long Lasting, Flawless Coverage, K-Beauty, 15g, 0.52 fl.oz
date: Reviewed in the United States on June 18, 2024
content:
Unfortunately, this ended up being a little too dark for my skin tone. :(

I did try it though. It applies very well and didn't look cakey or thick. I wish the color worked for me because I actually like the product. It would be great for a travel item (purse) because everything you need to apply it is contained within the compact.

title: PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion #21 Light Beige, Foundation, Korean Centella, Makeup Long Lasting, Flawless Coverage, K-Beauty, 15g, 0.52 fl.oz
date: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2024
content: I have tried other K-Beauty cushion foundations and this one is just as lovely. I will say I used a makeup brush to apply it instead of the applicator puff that's included so can't really speak to that. I'm almost 65, with some melasma/hyperpigmentation from years of sun worshiping, but this covered all my flaws beautifully and evened out my skin tone. The foundation is very lightweight, the coverage is buildable as certain areas needed a bit more, yet I never felt like I was wearing a face full of heavy makeup. I have combination skin (oilier in the T-zone/dry on the cheeks) but this stayed in place all day and still looked fresh after hours of wear. It comes in a pretty compact with a mirror, a separate space that holds the puff, and there was a refill included in the box! Great value for the price point.

title: PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion #21 Light Beige, Foundation, Korean Centella, Makeup Long Lasting, Flawless Coverage, K-Beauty, 15g, 0.52 fl.oz
date: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2024
content:
This is a really easy to use foundation. You literally just pat the included powder puff/sponge on the already-filled compact surface, press down, then use the puff to gently pat it on your face, and voila!‚Ä¶instant beauty. You actually get a lot with this too, since you get the prefilled compact, 2 application sponges, and one extra refill, so you can use it a long time without needing to reorder right away, making it a great value.

The foundation blends easily, has nice, even coverage, works on dry skin like mine, and leaves a beautifully dewy lightweight finish that feels like your own face, only better. It does a great job of covering some of my dark circles too, while looking perfectly natural.

The beige is a nice shade for summer, since it is a shade darker than what I would ordinarily wear‚Ä¶(perfect for that summer tan I hope I will get soon, LOL!) It wears and ‚Äúbreathes‚Äù well, even on some of the 95 degree days (which in this heat, I am loving how this literally is one and done‚Äî-one application and you‚Äôre done!) Plus, while wearing this, my dry skin feels very hydrated, with a nice satiny smooth finish‚Ä¶so yet another huge benefit!

I have been seeing these sponge/compact foundation styles more and more these days, and with coverage like this, I see why. The whole process of applying foundation has literally been simplified, because there is no foundation bottle to spill, or risk of over-dispensing foundation‚Ä¶.since ‚Äúeasy does it‚Äù with this product! Just a touch is needed.

Purito has a ‚Äúperfect for sensitive skin‚Äù formula that seems gentle enough for the driest of skin. As if that isn‚Äôt enough, it is also vegan-friendly, and cruelty-free too. It also doesn‚Äôt have any strong scents to it, it just feels ‚Äúpure‚Äù and ‚Äúclean‚Äù. I really love this foundation because of how it makes my skin look and feel. I really believe that you will also love this foundation if you try it, especially if you are looking for a foundation with all of these above-mentioned benefits!

title: PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion #21 Light Beige, Foundation, Korean Centella, Makeup Long Lasting, Flawless Coverage, K-Beauty, 15g, 0.52 fl.oz
date: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2024
content: I have really dry skin, and this foundation just goes beautifully over my skincare and gives me a dewy glow all day!

title: PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion #21 Light Beige, Foundation, Korean Centella, Makeup Long Lasting, Flawless Coverage, K-Beauty, 15g, 0.52 fl.oz
date: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2024
content: I was SO EXCITED to see Purito is now offering their Centella BB Cream in a cushion! This bb cream is incredible. It gives natural coverage and finish, feels lightweight and is great for my combination skin. It doesn‚Äôt break down in my t-zone as my skin starts to get oily throughout the day and it also doesn‚Äôt emphasize any dry patches. The cushion format only makes it even better. The compact is perfect and the applicator sponge works great for application. The trick is to pat the sponge on the inside of the product lid (not the mirror, but the cover of the product) to get the product to disperse through the sponge evenly for a perfect application. The value is also fantastic since you get a refill for the price!

title: PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion #21 Light Beige, Foundation, Korean Centella, Makeup Long Lasting, Flawless Coverage, K-Beauty, 15g, 0.52 fl.oz
date: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2024
content:
As I've gotten older, I have tried to simplify my makeup and skincare routine. I desire a more natural look these days. I had been longing for a product that wouldn't magnify my wrinkles or look cakey. This Centella BB cream by Purito Seoul has proven itself to be exactly what I had been looking for. It glides on smoothly and matches my skin tone well. It doesn't feel heavy, and it creates an appearance of flawless skin. I do struggle with dark circles, so I usually have to go over my eye area more than once.

Fortunately, this BB cream is buildable without the look or feel of heavy application. The combination of Hyaluronic acid, Korean Centella Asiatica, and Ceramides help to keep my skin looking and feeling youthful. This cream does not settle in my wrinkles. Instead, it nourishes, covers, and improves its overall appearance. The compact makes it easy to use while at home or on the go. A refill pan of BB cream is included for a plentiful supply. I'm overly satisfied so far with this product!!

title: PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion #21 Light Beige, Foundation, Korean Centella, Makeup Long Lasting, Flawless Coverage, K-Beauty, 15g, 0.52 fl.oz

title: PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion #21 Light Beige, Foundation, Korean Centella, Makeup Long Lasting, Flawless Coverage, K-Beauty, 15g, 0.52 fl.oz

title: PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion #21 Light Beige, Foundation, Korean Centella, Makeup Long Lasting, Flawless Coverage, K-Beauty, 15g, 0.52 fl.oz

content: The PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion is a very full coverage BB cream. It goes on smoothly

title: PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion #21 Light Beige, Foundation, Korean Centella, Makeup Long Lasting, Flawless Coverage, K-Beauty, 15g, 0.52 fl.oz
date: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2024
content:
Oof, this bb foundation color is so unlike what it appears to be. Even though the sponge looks like a "light beige" it applies as a pale ivory. I was pretty shocked at the end result. Trying to build up the color just made me look sicker and seemed to highlight the dark circles under my eyes.

I wasn't leaving the house so ended up wearing it for the rest of the day. By the time I washed my face that evening, I had two blemishes! I was shocked. My skin is sensitive (more to fragrance than anything), but for it to break out that quickly was really bad.

This was a big fail for me and I cannot recommend it. The color being so unlike both the photos and even what the product looked like in person was just unacceptable to me.

title: PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion #21 Light Beige, Foundation, Korean Centella, Makeup Long Lasting, Flawless Coverage, K-Beauty, 15g, 0.52 fl.oz
date: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2024
content: Compact and great for travel. It comes with an extra refill too.

title: PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion #21 Light Beige, Foundation, Korean Centella, Makeup Long Lasting, Flawless Coverage, K-Beauty, 15g, 0.52 fl.oz
date: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2024
content:
The color of the product is surprising. In the compact it looked way too dark. But it actually ended up being a really great match for me. Coverage is light and somewhat buildable. Natural looking finish.
I did 2 days of wear tests with this. I have oily skin, so I always use a primer and setting powder.
Day 1 I used a mattifying primer. Applied using the applicator. Buffed with brush. Set.
Then I did a little research on how to apply. I probably used too much.
So day 2 I tried more of a pore blurring primer. Applied it more thinly this time, dispersing it around the applicator first. This helped... But, results of both days are enhanced pores, caking, settling. It really looks great for maybe 3 to 4 hours. But then it starts breaking down. It is not long lasting. Is not transfer resistant. After 7-8 hours I just want to take it off.
So, if you have oily skin this may not be for you, unless you only need to wear it for a few hours.

title: PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion #21 Light Beige, Foundation, Korean Centella, Makeup Long Lasting, Flawless Coverage, K-Beauty, 15g, 0.52 fl.oz
date: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2024
content:
This is quite a high quality foundation product from an unknown company in Korea. Its cream based which I believe is a plus since it provides fuller coverage than power or liquid. But I do recognize cream may not be ideal for all since it also has tendency to be heavy and may clog pores.
The packaging is especially nice and solid. There‚Äôs separate compartments for the mirror and cushion applicator, apart from the cream based foundation. This helps maintain the makeup, preventing it from getting smashed. Plus it keeps the pad from absorbing more makeup than necessary when not in use.
So I was completely on board with this foundation until I noticed the Aluminum Hydroxide in the ingredients. I‚Äôm personally against our familyusing any products with aluminum just out of precaution. To be clear, I know Aluminum Hydroxide has been found safe in cosmetics since it doesn‚Äôt get absorbed in the skin, but it‚Äôs still not a risk I‚Äôm willing to take.

Thank you for reading and I hope you find this review helpful in making a purchasing decision.

title: PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion #21 Light Beige, Foundation, Korean Centella, Makeup Long Lasting, Flawless Coverage, K-Beauty, 15g, 0.52 fl.oz

title: PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion #21 Light Beige, Foundation, Korean Centella, Makeup Long Lasting, Flawless Coverage, K-Beauty, 15g, 0.52 fl.oz

content:
I am absolutely loving this bb cream in a cushion foundation compact. Bare in mind this is not what I consider a full coverage foundation. It's a BB cream and it just melts to your skin and you have this lovely glowing lightweight formula. I've been testing it for the last week against my TirTir and while I love my Tirtir I'm not always needing quite full coverage. This bb cream sits well, wears well and just makes my skin look so much better reducing redness and evening out my skin. I will say that when I first apply it has an almost greyish hue but then once it melts, it's a perfect match! I find it with a light application (which I prefer) it doesn't sink into my fine lines which at almost 60 almost everything tends to do. Overall, this is a lovely compact, comes with a refill! and at this price is a win win! Highly recommend!

title: PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion #21 Light Beige, Foundation, Korean Centella, Makeup Long Lasting, Flawless Coverage, K-Beauty, 15g, 0.52 fl.oz

content:
The color of this reminds me of old school BB cream.. when every shade had some degree of grey to it. I can wear shades 21 and 23 in Korean makeup depending on the season so as of right now, no.21 is a tad light(and grey). If you lean yellow-olive toned, avoid this cushion. The texture is also a bit thicker, which is not what many are looking for in a foundation nowadays. I can see it being medium to full coverage for most, but if you have raised blemishes, this may emphasize them a bit. Formula-wise, best suited for normal to oily. This is close to a soft matte finish.
I didn‚Äôt exactly notice any mention of spf on the product page, but it does have spf 30.

title: PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion #21 Light Beige, Foundation, Korean Centella, Makeup Long Lasting, Flawless Coverage, K-Beauty, 15g, 0.52 fl.oz
date: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2024
content:
This is a decent mid to full coverage foundation that doesn‚Äôt feel as drying or heavy as you would expect from the pigmentation. I usually apply foundations with a palette knife then press them in with the cushion, and this technique worked well to produce a natural finish. It wore well over sunscreen without pilling or flaking, and held up throughout a relatively hot day. It has a slightly sweet scent in the compact, but it was really barely there and went away after I applied it.

Shade 13 worked pretty well for me, although it does lean slightly yellow. Once blended out, it looked better on my skin. It also comes with a refill pack, which is always a good deal.

title: PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion #21 Light Beige, Foundation, Korean Centella, Makeup Long Lasting, Flawless Coverage, K-Beauty, 15g, 0.52 fl.oz
date: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2024
content:
As a fan of Korean skincare, I was excited to try the PURITO Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion (#21 Light Beige). The packaging is undeniably impressive ‚Äì beautifully designed and thoughtfully put together. It even included an extra refill and a face puff!

The BB cream itself performed well. The light beige shade perfectly matched my fair skin tone, and the coverage lasted throughout the day without appearing cakey or greasy. It felt lightweight and moisturizing on my mature skin (62 years old) without emphasizing imperfections.

However, there were a couple of drawbacks. First, adding depth to the coverage proved difficult. The finish leaned towards flat rather than offering buildable dimension. Second, the included puff applicator wasn't ideal. It felt flat and thin, making the application less than smooth. I much prefer using a brush for better control.

Overall, the PURITO Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion offers great coverage and a lightweight feel. With an improved applicator and the option for more buildable coverage, it could be a perfect BB cream.

title: PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion #21 Light Beige, Foundation, Korean Centella, Makeup Long Lasting, Flawless Coverage, K-Beauty, 15g, 0.52 fl.oz

title: PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion #21 Light Beige, Foundation, Korean Centella, Makeup Long Lasting, Flawless Coverage, K-Beauty, 15g, 0.52 fl.oz

title: PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion #21 Light Beige, Foundation, Korean Centella, Makeup Long Lasting, Flawless Coverage, K-Beauty, 15g, 0.52 fl.oz
date: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2024
content:
PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion #21 is a moisturizing cushion that, unlike many of the cushions I have used recently, allowed my skin to shine through, and looked very natural on my face. I was very surprised, and pleased. It's definitely a step above.

Frequently, cushions can appear flat and one-dimensional. When I apply the foundation, I worry about looking mask-like. This one did nothing of the sort; the pigment had depth, and my skin looked glowing, moisturized, but not too dewy; it was semi-matte, and sophisticated. The finish was satin, as opposed to the dewier coverage that has been in style for the past few years. I was delighted.

Yes, I recommend this. I like this cushion much more than the recent cushions I've tried. It lasted all day, through the heat. It looked good at the end of a busy day. Recommended.

title: PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion #21 Light Beige, Foundation, Korean Centella, Makeup Long Lasting, Flawless Coverage, K-Beauty, 15g, 0.52 fl.oz

title: PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion #21 Light Beige, Foundation, Korean Centella, Makeup Long Lasting, Flawless Coverage, K-Beauty, 15g, 0.52 fl.oz
date: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2024
content: Easy to use and includes a generous amount for the price. I like the way it applies and blends so easily. It is gentle on my skin and doesn't look harsh or too cakey. I will be looking into more products from this line.

title: PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion #21 Light Beige, Foundation, Korean Centella, Makeup Long Lasting, Flawless Coverage, K-Beauty, 15g, 0.52 fl.oz
date: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2024
content:
As far as liquid cushion foundations go, this one seems to be a good quality and a good value. At the current price of $30 with an included replacement cushion, the price per is about on par with cheaper drugstore products making it a good value for a higher quality product.
The foundation itself applies smoothly for light to medium coverage. My problem is that the color shown in the description IS NOT the color they send. You have to scroll down and will see that the ivory color is MUCH lighter than what they show in the main description which is a really annoying oversight. What is shown is absolutely one of the beige colors which would have worked for me. As it is, I cannot actually wear this. The makeup did apply nicely and seemed to give good coverage but I cannot speak to how long it lasts etc.
Overall, I think this is a pretty good product but the description photos are really misleading. I don‚Äôt want to have to spend 20 minutes searching the whole page to see what the product *actually* looks like. The main description should be completely accurate! If not for this, I think I‚Äôd give the product 5 stars.

title: PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion #21 Light Beige, Foundation, Korean Centella, Makeup Long Lasting, Flawless Coverage, K-Beauty, 15g, 0.52 fl.oz

title: PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion #21 Light Beige, Foundation, Korean Centella, Makeup Long Lasting, Flawless Coverage, K-Beauty, 15g, 0.52 fl.oz
date: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2024
content: I love the smoothness of this foundation. It's lightweight and buildable. Feels great on my skin and I like that it's soothing to the skin. Looks really pretty on. Love that the ingredients are good for my skin too. You get two compacts. A large one and a smaller one that's perfect to keep in my purse. The only problem I have is the color. It says it's a light beige but it's extremely light in color and there are pinkish undertones in it. I have yellow undertones. I would love to get this in my correct shade. It is a beautiful foundation, not drying at all and not oily either. I highly recommend this if you have light skin with pink undertones. Excellent product.

title: PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion #21 Light Beige, Foundation, Korean Centella, Makeup Long Lasting, Flawless Coverage, K-Beauty, 15g, 0.52 fl.oz

content:
I really like trying out k-beauty brands, I thought this was a nice price since this comes with an extra refill. It's awesome that it's not just makeup but also skincare with the addition of ceramides, Centella Asiatica and hyaluronic acid. There's a lot of positives about this foundation, it's vegan, cruelty free, as mentioned that its blended with skincare, doesn't have fragrance and has gentle ingredients.

I have combo skin. Some dry spots, some normal, an oily spot or two. I always start before using makeup with skincare and give it a few minutes to sink in before getting started. When I used this foundation, I discovered the shade, neutral ivory, was a bit too light for me. That happens sometimes since it's hard to choose the right color online. I'm neutral leaning warm and this was too cool for me. What I didn't really love about this foundation is that it seemed to sit on top of my skin vs. sinking in. It looked more like stage makeup than an everyday look. It was buildable, but didn't work with my skin type....Just not for me I suppose.

title: PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion #21 Light Beige, Foundation, Korean Centella, Makeup Long Lasting, Flawless Coverage, K-Beauty, 15g, 0.52 fl.oz
date: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2024
content: This BB provides full coverage with a little bit going a long way. The packaging is nice and large and it even comes with a refill. Great value! The color is as expected and blends well. Great product!

title: PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion #21 Light Beige, Foundation, Korean Centella, Makeup Long Lasting, Flawless Coverage, K-Beauty, 15g, 0.52 fl.oz
date: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2024
content: It has a very nice coverage and looks pretty good on my oily skin! It is blendable and buildable too! I like that it comes with a refill!

title: PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion #21 Light Beige, Foundation, Korean Centella, Makeup Long Lasting, Flawless Coverage, K-Beauty, 15g, 0.52 fl.oz
date: Reviewed in the United States on June 8, 2024
content:
This is lovely makeup for a young lady with oily skin. Maybe it's not so dry as we get older, and mine was fine until I hit my fifties. This makeup is a skinny layer of product that dries well and stays put‚Äîno fading for me‚Äîuntil the end of the day. I wear light-medium beige foundations or tinted moisturizers. These cushion foundations tend to be pasty on me. A darker color wasn't available to me. The puff applicator is pretty good; I prefer more of a puff, but these do not grab too much product and hold on to it as well. I have decided that I love how cushion compacts work, and they have a fantastic place for the sponge and one compartment for the mirror. You have to open a seal to get the makeup, which means the product is clean and fresh. This comes with a refill in foil and a dial in a lightweight, square, easy-to-wrap cardboard box.

If I found the proper lady, I would give this without hesitation as a gift item. It can be cleaned off easily. I recommend using the remover with your complexion in mind. It is listed as being for dry, oily, and combo complexions.

A reasonable price if this is your thing and you like to look light-complexioned and have a matte finish.

Enjoy!

title: PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion #21 Light Beige, Foundation, Korean Centella, Makeup Long Lasting, Flawless Coverage, K-Beauty, 15g, 0.52 fl.oz
date: Reviewed in the United States on June 8, 2024
content:
I've tried several cushion makeup brands. While nice formulas, most of the Korean foundations I've tried are too light for me (and probably 90% of American women). Despite the product photo of the Korean model with gorgeous, perfect porcelain skin, the shade I ordered (Natural Beige) is actually a perfect match for me!

The formula is amazing. It glides on and presses in easily while maintaining a moist and natural skin-like look. I used it without applying primer first, and it filled in my pores without looking cakey and gave a beautiful finish. I mean, it looks like actual skin but GOOD skin, not my usual 60-year-old-sun-damaged-large-pores-and-acne-scars skin.

The product itself comes in a compact with a mirror and applicator that stores inside the compact. This means it's easy to drop in your purse for touch-ups as well as for traveling. And if that's not enough incentive, it comes with an additional refill cushion.

I can't say enough about this. Sure, maybe I've only been using it for a few days, but it doesn't take long to know what you like when it comes to some kinds of makeup, and I am so pleased with this I will continue buying it when I run out. That says something because I'm rarely a repeat buyer - I'm always on the lookout for something that lives up to its promises of better-looking skin and have yet to find anything as nice as this. Hopefully the company will market additional shades because I really think they have a winner with this formula and that most people who try it will like it as much as I do.

title: PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion #21 Light Beige, Foundation, Korean Centella, Makeup Long Lasting, Flawless Coverage, K-Beauty, 15g, 0.52 fl.oz
date: Reviewed in the United States on June 8, 2024
content: First: This company knows how to package a product. It is beautifully packaged, well thought out and thought of. Two: It came with an entire EXTRA pod of make-up and face poof! Three: Light beige perfectly disappeared on my Fair to Ivory skin tone. Four: It lasted all day, wasn't cakey or greasy and provided FULL coverage. I am in love.

title: PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion #21 Light Beige, Foundation, Korean Centella, Makeup Long Lasting, Flawless Coverage, K-Beauty, 15g, 0.52 fl.oz
date: Reviewed in the United States on June 8, 2024
content: Works well. Hard to match yourself online- this technology could be better. But good coverage and easy application. No caking or creasing finish.

title: PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion #21 Light Beige, Foundation, Korean Centella, Makeup Long Lasting, Flawless Coverage, K-Beauty, 15g, 0.52 fl.oz
date: Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2024
content:
I have medium skin tone (Mediterranean descent) and the Neutral Ivory was a little too light for my skin to use alone. I found that the product works well to smooth out the skin and cover blemishes when used under my foundation. The product looks orange in the pictures, but the inside is actually a sponge and the product is immersed in the sponge. It comes with a nice puff to apply the product and is great for using on the go. You can also apply the product with your fingers. The compact has a mirror and it comes with a second refill that fits into the compact. The spare one came in separate packaging. I wish I hadn't opened it and hope it doesn't dry out by the time I use the first one up.

I didn't see ingredients listed on the box in English, so I can't list them in my review.

I have average mature skin (51 years old) which isn't sensitive. The BB cream didn't settle into my fine lines. I didn't experience any irritation from the product. The packaging is very nice and looks high end.

title: PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion #21 Light Beige, Foundation, Korean Centella, Makeup Long Lasting, Flawless Coverage, K-Beauty, 15g, 0.52 fl.oz
date: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2024
content:
Natural Beige offers good coverage and comes with a compact, a sponge, and a refill, which is a nice bonus. However, the shade was a bit too light for my skin tone, which made it less ideal for me.

When I first used the provided sponge, the application felt a little cakey. To get a more natural finish, I switched to using my foundation brush, which made a noticeable difference. The coverage became smoother and more even, without the cakey texture. Just be mindful of the shade and consider using your own brush for a more natural application.

title: PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion #21 Light Beige, Foundation, Korean Centella, Makeup Long Lasting, Flawless Coverage, K-Beauty, 15g, 0.52 fl.oz
date: Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2024
content: This foundation is wonderful. I have never used foundation in this format, but I love it. The product is embedded in a cushiony sponge, and you press your finger or the Purito applicator onto it to transfer it to your face. Coverage is great--it disguised my undereye circles as well as making my skin look perfect. Once applied, I couldn't even tell I was wearing foundation, which is a big deal for me because most liquid foundations make me feel like my face has been shrink-wrapped. Not this one. The applicator smooths the surface of the foundation perfectly. The compact is made with surgical precision and includes a mirror under the lid. I'm a huge packaging geek, and I'm truly impressed with this compact. There was even a refill included in the box! Truly impressed. This product makes me want to try everything else in the Purito line.

title: PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion #21 Light Beige, Foundation, Korean Centella, Makeup Long Lasting, Flawless Coverage, K-Beauty, 15g, 0.52 fl.oz
date: Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2024
content: This foundation glided on my skin, it exceeded my expectations. It came with an applicator to apply. It also came with a replacement foundation and an extra applicator.

title: PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion #21 Light Beige, Foundation, Korean Centella, Makeup Long Lasting, Flawless Coverage, K-Beauty, 15g, 0.52 fl.oz
date: Reviewed in Germany on January 4, 2025
content: Foundation liegt sehr leicht auf der Haut. Gef√§llt mir sehr gut. Die Deckkraft w√ºrde ich als Mittel bewerten.

title: PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion #21 Light Beige, Foundation, Korean Centella, Makeup Long Lasting, Flawless Coverage, K-Beauty, 15g, 0.52 fl.oz
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 7, 2024
content: The coverage is buildable - starts at light/medium coverage. It doesn't cause me to break out. Provides a nice even skin tone. Easy to use and lovely packaging - also came with a refill in a nice small box. Has a good size mirror. Separates the cushion and the actual sponge with a lid inbetween them - keeps it more sanitary and clean. The sponge has a nice band and you can fit at least 2 fingers in - I can fit 3. I like the shape, it helps to get into all the nooks and crannies. I have uneven skin and while it does show, it doesn't make them more obvious. Definitely use a good moisturiser underneath if you have dry skin. Peach fuzz can be slightly obvious if not blended in well. The colour it came in surprisingly suited my skin colour - it looked a lot lighter in the cushion. It does oxidise ever so slightly and goes a little darker - not obvious but it happens. If you have dry skin and not well moisturised - I do find it does crease after a long time - will keep up for a whole day if your skin is moisturised. Satin kind of finish.

title: PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion #21 Light Beige, Foundation, Korean Centella, Makeup Long Lasting, Flawless Coverage, K-Beauty, 15g, 0.52 fl.oz
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 20, 2024
content:
great product works beautifully on my skin and matches my shade covers all my flows and easy to apply
good value and compact

title: PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion #21 Light Beige, Foundation, Korean Centella, Makeup Long Lasting, Flawless Coverage, K-Beauty, 15g, 0.52 fl.oz
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 26, 2024
content:
I'm a fan of lighter, more practical makeup and this cushion is everything I was looking for because it has a more natural coverage.

I have oily skin and I liked the texture it left on my face and how long it lasted.

This cushion is high quality, easy to apply, a great investment for everyday use, great value for money, I'm satisfied and would like to recommend it.

PS: The only thing I would change would be the colour I chose to be a darker one, but I still think the colour worked well on my face.

title: PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion #21 Light Beige, Foundation, Korean Centella, Makeup Long Lasting, Flawless Coverage, K-Beauty, 15g, 0.52 fl.oz
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 22, 2024
content: This is a review for shade Natural Beige: the colour is much lighter than it looks in the box. The product is also a little drier than I expected. It's easy to apply and nicely packaged but unfortunately disappointing as the shade is completely not what I expected. Unless you have very oily skin, I also wouldn't recommend applying this without any base underneath as you may end up with dry patches of flaky skin which will look really unsightly.

title: PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion #21 Light Beige, Foundation, Korean Centella, Makeup Long Lasting, Flawless Coverage, K-Beauty, 15g, 0.52 fl.oz
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 21, 2024
content: The shade was a little dark and coverage heavier than I usually like, but it's a good quality product and reasonably priced. Not keen on the puff applicator but you can use a brush or fingers just as easily. It's a lovely little compact and you'll love it if you like decent coverage.

title: PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion #21 Light Beige, Foundation, Korean Centella, Makeup Long Lasting, Flawless Coverage, K-Beauty, 15g, 0.52 fl.oz
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 11, 2024
content:
This was my first time using a ‚Äòbb cushion‚Äô and don‚Äôt really know what to expect and whether enough coverage would be provided.

I have very oily skin which is prone to break outs, particularly when changing to new products. Having used this product for 2 weeks I can honestly say it‚Äôs been great and has not caused any skin upset.

The coverage is a good medium layer, covering any blemishes without feeling to thick, allowing the skin to breath.

The product is well presented and feels and looks premium, great colour and blends well with my skin, good overall.

title: PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion #21 Light Beige, Foundation, Korean Centella, Makeup Long Lasting, Flawless Coverage, K-Beauty, 15g, 0.52 fl.oz
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 6, 2024
content:
This product was sent to me to review, as part of Amazon Vine. The below is my own real-world experience of using it.

Full disclosure, I don't usually wear lots of makeup, but have recently considered using a BB cream, due to its coverage and convenience - the Purito Seoul seemed to fit the bill.

It comes well-presented in the box, with the compact being the ideal size to pop in a handbag. I also liked the separate compartments for the sponge and the product itself - handy for keeping the sponge clean and dry between uses.

I found it very easy to apply, and also didn't feel like I needed to use a lot - the coverage was excellent, and even more impressively, was almost an exact match for my skin tone. I have previously struggled to find a foundation colour that does not look too yellow/orange on my skin, so I was very surprised to see how well this one blended. The finish made my face look like it had been airbrushed - I could hardly notice my pores at all.

To try and illustrate the colour match, I have added a photo to show one half of my forehead covered, one not.

In summary, it is a very good value item that I will continue to use.

title: PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion #21 Light Beige, Foundation, Korean Centella, Makeup Long Lasting, Flawless Coverage, K-Beauty, 15g, 0.52 fl.oz
date: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2024
content:
It doesn't feel too heavy on my face and let me tell you, it's very hot today and I am sweating.
So far doesn't seem to be budging.
It goes on easily and gives great coverage without drying out my skin.

title: PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion #21 Light Beige, Foundation, Korean Centella, Makeup Long Lasting, Flawless Coverage, K-Beauty, 15g, 0.52 fl.oz
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 6, 2024

Lightweight, blends well and gorgeous colour!
Hard to find a good shade match when getting makeup online but this one worked well, i found the coverage easy to build and blend. It‚Äôs quite pricey so i dont know that i would buy again but is a pretty good product.

title: PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion #21 Light Beige, Foundation, Korean Centella, Makeup Long Lasting, Flawless Coverage, K-Beauty, 15g, 0.52 fl.oz

The price is astronomical which means I would never ever purchase this again although you do get the two packs in it they are very luxurious very well made but the product itself is not great, this appearance is top-notch but the match is absolutely terrible and absolutely nothing like the picture so if you are spending an awful large amount of Money on this for it to be the incorrect shared would be very, very disappointing

title: PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion #21 Light Beige, Foundation, Korean Centella, Makeup Long Lasting, Flawless Coverage, K-Beauty, 15g, 0.52 fl.oz

content:
I've tried several cushion makeup brands. While the formulas are nice, most of the Korean foundations I've tried are too light for me (and probably 90% of American women). Despite the product photo featuring a Korean model with gorgeous, perfect porcelain skin, the shade I ordered (Natural Beige) is actually a perfect match for me!
The formula is astounding. It glides on and presses in effortlessly, maintaining a moist and natural skin-like appearance. I used it without applying primer first, and it filled in my pores without looking cakey, providing a beautiful finish. It genuinely looks like actual skin, but good skin‚Äînot my usual 60-year-old sun-damaged, large-pores-and-acne-scars skin.
The product itself comes in a compact with a mirror and an applicator stored inside the compact. This makes it easy to pop into your handbag for touch-ups as well as for travelling. And if that's not enough incentive, it comes with an additional refill cushion.
I can't praise this enough. Sure, I've only been using it for a few days, but it doesn‚Äôt take long to know what you like when it comes to certain types of makeup. I am so pleased with this that I will continue buying it when I run out. That says something, as I'm rarely a repeat buyer‚Äîalways on the lookout for something that lives up to its promises of better-looking skin. Yet, I have found nothing as delightful as this. title: PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion #21 Light Beige, Foundation, Korean Centella, Makeup Long Lasting, Flawless Coverage, K-Beauty, 15g, 0.52 fl.oz
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 21, 2024
content:
This BB Cushion in Neutral Ivory colour Foundation with Korean Centella has quickly become a staple in my makeup routine. Not only does it provide flawless coverage and a long-lasting finish, but it also gives my skin a dewy matte look that I absolutely love. One of my favorite things about this foundation is how well it conceals my dark eye circles ‚Äì with just 1-2 applications, they disappear completely. It doesn't irritate my sensitive skin. In fact, I have noticed that my skin looks and feels healthier since I started using it. I also appreciate the natural sunscreen included in the formula, giving me added protection from the sun's harmful rays.

This foundation hides imperfections on my face without feeling heavy or cakey. It provides coverage without weighing my skin down. Plus, the handy compact cushion makes it a breeze to touch up throughout the day.

The only downside I have found with this foundation is that the Neutral Ivory shade is not the best match for my skin tone. I wish there were more options available so I could find the perfect match for my complexion.

Overall, though, I am impressed with this product and will continue to use it in my daily routine. Thank you for taking time to read my review. I hope you üëç find it helpful.

title: PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion #21 Light Beige, Foundation, Korean Centella, Makeup Long Lasting, Flawless Coverage, K-Beauty, 15g, 0.52 fl.oz
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 19, 2024
content: This cushion foundation / BB cream is one of my favourite cushions. I have a tirtir red cushion as well as a romand grey cushion and I honestly really like how lightweight this is. The colour is slightly darker than my skin but it's not super noticeable since I wear a lot of modest clothing and it matches with my hands closely enough. When applied in thin layers I don't find that it looks patchy or creases like some other cushions I have used in the past.

title: PURITO SEOUL Wonder Releaf Centella BB Cushion #21 Light Beige, Foundation, Korean Centella, Makeup Long Lasting, Flawless Coverage, K-Beauty, 15g, 0.52 fl.oz
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 14, 2024
content: This Purito seoul wonder centella bb cushion is absolutely fantastic. It contains two BB foundation cushions, which can last for a long time. I really like the BB cushion as it is rather lightweight, and it blends with my skin tone perfectly. I think if you like a natural glow look, this is a great foundation to be considered. But if you are into full coverage, you might find the foundation a bit thin in coverage. It has a nice soft makeup pad which is so good for blending. ¬£28 for two cushions, it is not bad value for money at all. you can have a touch-up anytime you needed. love this! I will purchase again.

The smell does not linger on the skin.

It actually leaves my skin looking and feeling dewy after rinsing it off. I had no irritation, redness, stinging, or increase in breakouts on my sensitive, acne-prone skin following use. Great product!

title: PURITO Mighty Bamboo Panthenol Cleanser, Gentle Face Wash for Moisturizing, for Sensitive Skin, Vegan & Cruelty-Free Face Cleanser150ml / 5.07 fl. Oz.

title: PURITO Mighty Bamboo Panthenol Cleanser, Gentle Face Wash for Moisturizing, for Sensitive Skin, Vegan & Cruelty-Free Face Cleanser150ml / 5.07 fl. Oz.

title: PURITO Mighty Bamboo Panthenol Cleanser, Gentle Face Wash for Moisturizing, for Sensitive Skin, Vegan & Cruelty-Free Face Cleanser150ml / 5.07 fl. Oz.
date: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2024
content: I was not expecting much from this. It didn‚Äôt promise much or looked like it did much, but it has been my best face cleanser so far. It makes my skin feel smooth and less bumpy right away. I usually need to rub cleanser on my nose especially for a while to give the same effect as this one does in half of the time. But even though it is a powerful product, it doesn‚Äôt feel like a toxic one. It is mild and great for daily use. I didn‚Äôt care for the scent though and could do without it but it‚Äôs not overpowering in any way.

title: PURITO Mighty Bamboo Panthenol Cleanser, Gentle Face Wash for Moisturizing, for Sensitive Skin, Vegan & Cruelty-Free Face Cleanser150ml / 5.07 fl. Oz.

I have very oily acne prone skin and it makes my face feel quite clean, almost squeaky clean without making it feel super dry. That's great because my face doesn't try too much to overcompensate oil production afterwards

title: PURITO Mighty Bamboo Panthenol Cleanser, Gentle Face Wash for Moisturizing, for Sensitive Skin, Vegan & Cruelty-Free Face Cleanser150ml / 5.07 fl. Oz.

content: This is a nice facial cleanser. It has a light tea tree oil scent, is clear and has a slippery feel. It rinses cleanly and doesn‚Äôt seem to leave a film of itself behind. My sensitive skin is not bothered by it.

title: PURITO Mighty Bamboo Panthenol Cleanser, Gentle Face Wash for Moisturizing, for Sensitive Skin, Vegan & Cruelty-Free Face Cleanser150ml / 5.07 fl. Oz.
date: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2024
content: The cleanser had a clean and refreshing scent. It was very mild. The cleanser had a good lather and it washed out cleanly. It didn't leave any residue behind. It wasn't drying and it didn't leave my skin feeling tight or dried out.

title: PURITO Mighty Bamboo Panthenol Cleanser, Gentle Face Wash for Moisturizing, for Sensitive Skin, Vegan & Cruelty-Free Face Cleanser150ml / 5.07 fl. Oz.

It has a rather strong tea tree smell that was more than I'm used to in a cleaner. If you're sensitive to scents, that may bother you. Other than that, I really like how well this cleaned my face, and my sensitive skin didn't flare up, which is very rare.

title: PURITO Mighty Bamboo Panthenol Cleanser, Gentle Face Wash for Moisturizing, for Sensitive Skin, Vegan & Cruelty-Free Face Cleanser150ml / 5.07 fl. Oz.

content: Great! Cleansing but not overly stripping. The ingredients seem good, REALLY happy that there's no fragrances which I find not only unnecessary but quite irritating to my allergies and skin etc.

title: PURITO Mighty Bamboo Panthenol Cleanser, Gentle Face Wash for Moisturizing, for Sensitive Skin, Vegan & Cruelty-Free Face Cleanser150ml / 5.07 fl. Oz.
date: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2024
content: Like many Purito skincare products, this one works great on the skin. This is the new version of their older ph cleanser, reformulated with bamboo extract and pantheon to help strengthen the skin barrier. I love that it feels smooth and gentle, works well, and does not leave my face dry or irritated. I have normal to dry skin and this cleanser makes my skin feel hydrated after cleansing. It's a great addition to my routine!

title: PURITO Mighty Bamboo Panthenol Cleanser, Gentle Face Wash for Moisturizing, for Sensitive Skin, Vegan & Cruelty-Free Face Cleanser150ml / 5.07 fl. Oz.
date: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2024
content:
Since I have used Purito skin care products before and enjoyed them, I had no hesitation in ordering this Mighty Bamboo Panthenol Cleanser from them.

It was love at first sight of the ingredients. Mainly because this cleanser is indeed very gentle, it doesn't contain any harsh ingredients like sulfates, all of the surfactants in it and even the preservative used are all very mild.

There is no added fragrance either, but there is a very mild fresh scent, like aloe or something similar. The cleanser is a gel and I love how it glides across the skin making rich, dense and abundant foam. It is easy to rinse and did not leave my skin feeling dried out at all. As a matter of fact, my skin felt very clean and soft after using this cleanser, and even the redness from my rosacea calmed down.

Afterward I used toner on a cotton pad and no residual makeup or any other gunk showed up, so I'm assured that even though it's gentle, this cleanser does a great job.

Currently this cleanser is selling for $15, and I think that is an excellent price for a cleanser that works and is very clean in its formula. Going forward I will be using this as my second step cleansing after my oil cleanser, and because it's so affordable I can stock up!

title: PURITO Mighty Bamboo Panthenol Cleanser, Gentle Face Wash for Moisturizing, for Sensitive Skin, Vegan & Cruelty-Free Face Cleanser150ml / 5.07 fl. Oz.
date: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2024
content: Like Purito's other products, I find this Mighty Bamboo Panthenol Cleanser is nice and gentle on my skin. This is a Bamboo-infused cleanser that intends to maintain the skin's mildly acidic pH and helps with the skin's natural barrier from any environmental irritants. The formula is more of a gentle gel cleanser where the lather is quite light, and tight, but not super bubbly. It's not drying and has a light scent of bamboo and tea tree oil to assist with impurities. It's simple and now I can use it with my Purito moisturizer.

title: PURITO Mighty Bamboo Panthenol Cleanser, Gentle Face Wash for Moisturizing, for Sensitive Skin, Vegan & Cruelty-Free Face Cleanser150ml / 5.07 fl. Oz.
date: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2024
content: Cleans well. Feels smooth. Not greasy. No bad odor. No rashes or such, just a well moisturized feeling after use.

title: PURITO Mighty Bamboo Panthenol Cleanser, Gentle Face Wash for Moisturizing, for Sensitive Skin, Vegan & Cruelty-Free Face Cleanser150ml / 5.07 fl. Oz.
date: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2024
content:
Not my first product from the Purito brand, so I was excited to try another product.

Met my expectations as a gentle cleanser.
I am a curious one, so I looked up the benefits of bamboo extract, and learned something new, how wonderful bamboo (bambusa vulgaris) is for the skin to help retain moisture.
I had previously researched and learned about Panthenol.

I am always on the hunt to learn new information.

As I mentioned, this is not my first product by Purito. I had the pleasure and opportunity to try a centella toner, another new ingredient I learned about.

I ALWAYS click on the seller store link, this is the hyperlink located right under the product title.
They have such depth of products in the skin care line
I would love to try the oil based cleanser. That's another thing, I never thought one would cleanse with oil, when one is trying to remove oils in the skin. But, I am learning so much.
This new generation has such an advantage with access to the internet to learn about products, and to start a better skin care routine at an earlier age.
I am playing catch-up for my older skin.

I do have sensitive skin, and try to stay away from harsh acids and cleansers.
So this totally meets my expectations.

Purito - keep up the great work.

Vielleicht noch 2- 3 S√§tze zu den hervorragenden koreanischen Kosmetikprodukten ...
Der Name verr√§t es ja eigentlich schon: Koreanische Kosmetik stammt aus Korea, genauer gesagt S√ºdkorea. Das Land ist n√§mlich schon seit einigen Jahren im asiatischen Raum bekannt f√ºr seine Sch√∂nheitsideale. Ob in der Mode- oder aber auch der Kosmetikszene: Hier werden die Trends gemacht. Damit wurde nach vielen Jahren Japan vom Thron gesto√üen .
Die Koreaner verfolgen schon bei der Entwicklung ihrer Hautpflegeprodukte einen Ansatz, von dem wir bei vielen westlichen Herstellern leider nur tr√§umen k√∂nnen . Alle Produkte sind cruelty-free. Du wirst keine Originalware finden, die an Tieren getestet wurde. Ein Grundsatz, der inzwischen sogar per Gesetz festgehalten wurde.
Doch auch sonst steht die koreanische Kosmetik im Einklang mit der Natur. Denn hier setzt man darauf, auf unn√∂tige Zus√§tze komplett zu verzichten. Alkohol, PEG, Silikone und √§hnliches wirst du hier in der Regel vergebens suchen. Stattdessen werden wertvolle Zutaten aus der Natur eingesetzt. W√§hrend sich im europ√§ischen Raum oft auch Produkte als Naturkosmetik bezeichnen, die kaum eine Pflanze gesehen haben, ist das in Korea anders. Denn hier gibt es deutliche Richtlinien, an die sich die Hersteller halten m√ºssen, um ein Siegel zu erhalten, dass die Produkte als ‚Äûnat√ºrlich‚Äú ausweisen. In Deutschland hingegen haben wir keine solche einheitlichen, rechtlichen Auflagen.Wenn du ein Label mit der Bezeichnung ‚ÄúMade in Korea‚Äù findest, wei√üt du sicher, dass du hier ein absolutes Qualit√§tsprodukt in der Hand h√§ltst. Was nicht hei√üen soll, dass nicht andere Hersteller auch diese Ans√§tze verfolgen, sondern nur, dass sich die folgenden Punkte leicht auf alle koreanische Kosmetik √ºbertragen lassen. Denn zum einen sind die Inhaltsstoffe, wie oben schon beschrieben, hochwertig und nat√ºrlich, zum anderen stimmt aber auch das Drumherum. So wird in Korea der Fokus auf alle Geschlechter gelegt und die Pflegeserien werden genau auf die unterschiedlichen Bed√ºrfnisse eines jeden Hauttyps angepasst.
Nachzulesen bei lovemycosmetics ....

Einer der wichtigsten Inhaltsstoffe ist Centella. In der Kosmetik wird die Pflanze f√ºr Ihre Antiaging-Wirkung sowie ihre feuchtigkeitsspendenden und regenerierenden Eigenschaften gesch√§tzt. Dank ihres hohen Gehalts an Antioxidantien kommt Centella Asiatica bei der Bek√§mpfung vorzeitiger Hautalterung zum Einsatz.
Ich verwende das Reinigungsgel morgens und abends und finde es sehr gut vertr√§glich. Es spendet der Haut viel Feuchtigkeit und hinterl√§sst keinen Fettfilm. Man hat das Gef√ºhl, die Haut ist wirklich sehr gut gereinigt.
Ich kann das Gel sehr empfehlen!

Der Artikel wurde mir im Zuge des Vine-Programms kostenlos zur Verf√ºgung gestellt, ich bewerte trotzdem genau so ehrlich, wie ich es bei einem regul√§ren Kauf machen w√ºrde und vergebe hier 5 Sterne.

Ho deciso di provarlo perch√© io faccio la doppia detersione tutti i giorni, acqua micellare+detergente viso.
Questo √® arrivato ben imballato e perfettamente integro. Il flacone √® da 150ml, dura 12 mesi dall'apertura e quello che mi √® arrivato ha una scadenza da qui a 3 anni. Mi ha incuriosito il fatto che √® made in Corea, molto in voga ultimamente per quanto riguarda la skin-care.

La lista degli ingredienti (lascio foto) la trovo abbastanza corta e vedo tutti ingredienti naturali, idratanti, antibatterici, lenitivi e protettivi come: pantenolo, acido laurico, tea tree oil, ecc. L'app Yuka lo valuta il suo INCI come eccellente con 93 su 100. Non mi pare contenga profumi o almeno io non li ho sentiti.

Io lo usando al mattino (per rimuovere i residui della crema notte) e la sera dopo essermi struccata con l'acqua micellare e mi sto trovando molto bene, non mi irrita ne secca la pelle e mi pare che anche i rossori siano leggermente attenuati. A differenza di altri detergenti viso provati questo non mi ha dato fastidio agli occhi. L'unico appunto √® che avrei preferito un tappo con l'erogatore per praticit√†, ma capisco che data la consistenza tipo gel/crema hanno preferito un packaging pi√π da crema che da detergente.

Il prezzo √® leggermente alto (16e al momento della recensione) ma bisogna considerare che ne serve davvero poco, a me ne basta una quantit√† simile ad un pisello per detergere tutto il viso. Lo consiglio particolarmente a pelli sensibili soprattutto adesso che con l'inverno e quindi il freddo la pelle del viso tende a seccarsi maggiormente.

title: PURITO Luminous Moisture Shea Butter Body Lotion, Shea Butter, Gentle on Skin, Moisturizing, Dry Skin, Pump Bottle, K-Beauty, 300ml / 10.14 fl. oz. (Midnight Romance, 10.14 fl. oz.)

content: This shea butter body lotion is incredibly moisturizing but not heavy at all. It feels great going on the skin, absorbs quickly and does not leave a greasy residue. The scent is very gentle and won't compete with any cologne or perfume you usually wear.

title: PURITO Luminous Moisture Shea Butter Body Lotion, Shea Butter, Gentle on Skin, Moisturizing, Dry Skin, Pump Bottle, K-Beauty, 300ml / 10.14 fl. oz. (Midnight Romance, 10.14 fl. oz.)

content: This lotion feels fantastic going on, smells amazing but not overwhelming, and the moisture lasts all day. I haven't been this impressed with a body lotion in many years.

title: PURITO Luminous Moisture Shea Butter Body Lotion, Shea Butter, Gentle on Skin, Moisturizing, Dry Skin, Pump Bottle, K-Beauty, 300ml / 10.14 fl. oz. (Midnight Romance, 10.14 fl. oz.)
date: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2025
content:
This lotion is light weight. It's not like a body butter, it's more like a typical body or hand lotion.

It's very fragrant. It primarily reminds me of the lotions one gets with perfume sets. It's not subtle. It's one note. You will only catch the floral scent. It smells strongly of jasmine to me, though it says it's a different flower.

This is a nice quality lotion, but it doesn't seem modern to me. More like a flashback of your mom's vanity-top lotion she only used on special occasions (think 80s decadence).

title: PURITO Luminous Moisture Shea Butter Body Lotion, Shea Butter, Gentle on Skin, Moisturizing, Dry Skin, Pump Bottle, K-Beauty, 300ml / 10.14 fl. oz. (Midnight Romance, 10.14 fl. oz.)
