content: This is a fragrance free lotion that can be used on both your hands or as a body lotion. It actually does have a very light scent to it but I found it to be pleasant. It takes about two minutes once you apply it to absorb into your skin. It comes in a nicely packaged bottle with a quality pump. I keep it in my guest bathroom to pamper my guests.

title: PURITO Luminous Moisture Shea Butter Body Lotion, Shea Butter, Gentle on Skin, Moisturizing, Dry Skin, Pump Bottle, K-Beauty, 300ml / 10.14 fl. oz. (Midnight Romance, 10.14 fl. oz.)
date: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2025
content: The scent of this body lotion is quite calming. It's a nice light perfume scent that feels luxurious, yet subtle. It's not overpowering, so it's easy on my senses and doesn't bother those around me. It dispenses just the right amount easily via pump with no leakage or spillage. It arrived in great condition. The top part was twisted to ensure no spillage as well. It's also a great consistency and doesn't feel so thick or watery, but just right. The bottle I would say is a good size too.

title: PURITO Luminous Moisture Shea Butter Body Lotion, Shea Butter, Gentle on Skin, Moisturizing, Dry Skin, Pump Bottle, K-Beauty, 300ml / 10.14 fl. oz. (Midnight Romance, 10.14 fl. oz.)

content: Delivers exactly what it promises, a smooth texture that absorbs immediately into my skin without any greasy residue (which is usually my biggest issue with most hand creams). The scent is subtle yet soothing. Most importantly, my dry hands feel genuinely moisturized and soft. Recommend.

title: PURITO Luminous Moisture Shea Butter Body Lotion, Shea Butter, Gentle on Skin, Moisturizing, Dry Skin, Pump Bottle, K-Beauty, 300ml / 10.14 fl. oz. (Midnight Romance, 10.14 fl. oz.)
date: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2025
content: This is a nice body lotion. It has a light and creamy texture and goes on smoothly. I love how quickly it absorbs into my dry, winter skin and leaves it feeling hydrated without any greasy residue. It has a strong pleasant scent that doesn't bother my sensitive nose, but might be an issue for those who have sensitivities. The clean and modern look is a bonus. This body lotion is a welcome addition to my daily routine!

title: PURITO Luminous Moisture Shea Butter Body Lotion, Shea Butter, Gentle on Skin, Moisturizing, Dry Skin, Pump Bottle, K-Beauty, 300ml / 10.14 fl. oz. (Midnight Romance, 10.14 fl. oz.)
date: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2025
content:
I wasn't sure about which scent to order with this Purito body lotion, but I love all my other Purito products so I thought I would take the chance. I ordered the cotton scent and I don't really know how to describe it. But it is a clean scent, maybe with some floral notes but not overly so. No musky or earthy scents which is good for me.

I'm a little fussy about scented beauty products and even though I enjoy this scent, I'm a little hesitant to use it on my entire body. So for now I'm using it as a hand lotion, something I use a lot of especially this time of year. It's very moisturizing so is really meeting my current needs with lots of handwashing due to having covid currently going through my household. So the moisturizing is good for my hands while the scent gives my spirits a little lift. And it's from Purito, they haven't missed yet on any of the products I've tried from them.

title: PURITO Luminous Moisture Shea Butter Body Lotion, Shea Butter, Gentle on Skin, Moisturizing, Dry Skin, Pump Bottle, K-Beauty, 300ml / 10.14 fl. oz. (Midnight Romance, 10.14 fl. oz.)
date: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2025
content:
In the winter especially, I find that my skin needs extra hydration and this lotion delivers! PURITO is an amazing skincare brand for face, focusing on quality ingredients and this body lotion contains Shea Butter as well as Jeju Starflower, both focusing on increasing and maintaining moisture levels in the skin. I also appreciate that, though the product is scented, it is formulated so that it is clinically proven to contain no fragrance allergens.

The formula is mid-weight, not thick like a body butter but not runny either. It was absorbed in my skin in under a minute, leaving it deeply hydrated but not sticky at all. My skin felt super smooth! The scent I chose ('Midnight Romance') initially seemed a bit strong but faded to be more subtle in about 5 minutes and is delightful like a nice floral garden perfume.

title: PURITO Luminous Moisture Shea Butter Body Lotion, Shea Butter, Gentle on Skin, Moisturizing, Dry Skin, Pump Bottle, K-Beauty, 300ml / 10.14 fl. oz. (Midnight Romance, 10.14 fl. oz.)

title: PURITO Luminous Moisture Shea Butter Body Lotion, Shea Butter, Gentle on Skin, Moisturizing, Dry Skin, Pump Bottle, K-Beauty, 300ml / 10.14 fl. oz. (Midnight Romance, 10.14 fl. oz.)
date: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2025
content:
I love this 'PURITO' body lotion, it's a very nice quality Korean skincare product that works well. The bottle is a nice size, and has a convenient push-pump style top; this makes it easy to dispense an appropriate amount.

I love the scent that I ordered, which is called Midnight Romance; fragrance is very nice, and dries down to a soft (and pleasant) smell. To me, I can definitely smell the orchid, violet, musk, and some sandalwood; I like that it's not a strong overpowering scent, and that it's like a soft powdery scent that lasts.

The lotion has a nice moisturizing feeling to it, but doesn't feel heavy or greasy. It absorbs nicely onto my skin, and helps to make my skin feel soft and smooth. This has especially been helpful during the dry winter season that I'm living in right now; but would be great all year-round. I love that a little bit goes a long way, and it's pleasant to use on my hands and body.

This is a great product, and of very nice quality; it works well, and is very helpful. I'm very happy with this item, and would love to order another bottle; whether to try another scent, or as a gift idea. I also think it's a great value for the price point, at least in my opinion. I absolutely love this lotion!

This comes in a 300ml plastic bottle with push down pump dispenser, making it very convenient and less messy to use than a tub. First impressions are positive and it feels like a good quality product overall, which is perhaps reflected in the higher price. It‚Äôs designed to be deeply moisturising and the brand shows some clinical trial to demonstrate this.

This has an ‚ÄúOcean Breeze‚Äù ‚ÄúKorea-inspired uplifting scent‚Äù, which I quite like as it‚Äôs a little fruity and sweet with a hint of sandalwood I think, and I don‚Äôt find overpowering. I think these days I actually quite like a bit of a scent to body and hair products, as long as it‚Äôs appealing, which thankfully I find this one is. The lotion is quite silky soft in texture and has a good consistency that‚Äôs neither too thick nor too thin. I don‚Äôt need too much per application and it smooths on nicely. It absorbs pretty well and doesn‚Äôt leave any stickiness afterwards, but I can feel I‚Äôve got lotion on. It definitely leaves my skin feeling softer and smoother shortly after use, which is lovely. I‚Äôm hoping that with more regular use, that benefit will become more long term as it helps repair my rather dry and neglected skin, especially on my legs.

Also good to know is that this isn‚Äôt tested on animals and uses ‚Äúgentle ingredients‚Äù. It‚Äôs also vegan, for those to whom this applies. I‚Äôd say it‚Äôs gentle, or at least that‚Äôs how it feels to me and I‚Äôm glad to say I‚Äôve not had any irritation from using it. I‚Äôve no downsides to the product actually. I love using it and it‚Äôs helping to moisturise my skin so I‚Äôm very happy with it!

content: First off, I really love the scent. It's a pleasant combination of an intensely musky base aroma and citrus. You can also clearly smell the bergamot, so it's a nice array of both sweet and sour citrus when mixed together with all the tangerine. The fragrance is not subtle at all, so this may be highly irritating to those sensitive to scents. But as much as I adore the fragrance, it's very poor functional-wise. I run dry, so I course need lots of moisture. I literally needed several heaping pumps of this lotion to even feel remotely hydrated, and my skin just felt very tight and itchy after a while has passed and it fully absorbed into the skin. It's doubly confusing because this is supposed to have Shea butter as a featured active. In any case, I honestly would not recommend these if you need a lot more than a pretty scent to try this out.

Como digo, hay cremas hidratantes muy famosas, que se venden mucho, en hipermercados y tiendas de perfumeria y que tienen incluso formatos de tama√±o grande, que podr√°n hidratar mucho, pero para mi gusto la sensaci√≥n que deja, no me compensa. Eso me lleva a que de vez en cuando, si no hay de la que suelo usar o no compro o compro una de las otras y al final la acabo regalando y de vez en cuando se me seca la piel.

Sin ir mas lejos este verano, ya he contado varias veces en rese√±as de productos de col√°geno, que nado todo el a√±o üèä‚Äç‚ôÄ pero este verano me limite al protector solar la mayor parte del verano, y de tanto cloro acabe con la piel hecha polvo, toda reseca. A base de volver a usar cremas y col√°geno, necesite unas 4 semanas para recuperar algo y 6 semanas para que tuviera el aspecto habitual.

As√≠ que eso prueba que tengo tolerancia cero con las cremas hidratantes que ‚Äúpringan‚Äù mucho, aunque hidraten bien y a otras personas les guste.

Al aplicarla, ya se nota una textura m√°s suave y no tan densa y pringosa como otras, se seca bien y tiene un aroma agradable. Son 300 ml y no se cuanto me durara, aunque lo cierto es que se extiende muy bien y una peque√±a cantidad cunde mucho. Mientras que con el otro tipo de cremas m√°s pegajosas, son tan densas, que aunque aprietes suavemente suele salir un pegote gordo.

Obviamente comparada con todas esas cremas que tanto se venden y que tienen formatos de botes enormes, sale mas cara. Pero es que yo no puedo con esas cremas.

Esta hecha principalmente a base de Karit√©, que es conocida por una intensa hidrataci√≥n, ayudar a proteger y regenerar la piel, e ingluso tiene propiedades antiinflamatorias que pueden ayudar a calmar la piel irritada. En teor√≠a el Karit√© tambi√©n ayuda en el proceso de cicatrizaci√≥n, estrias y varices, aunque esto ultimo, me imagino que ser√°n productos mas especificos.

La verdad es que hab√≠a o√≠do y le√≠do buenas cosas de los productos de cosmetica coreanos üá∞üá∑ pero nunca hab√≠a usado uno hasta ahora, y aunque obviamente habr√° buenos y malos, de momento mi primera experiencia la pasa con nota.

‚úÖüëç Crema hidratante de Karit√©. Buena hidrataci√≥n, textura, no deja sensaci√≥n pringosa y se extiende muy bien con poca cantidad.
‚úÖüëç Aroma muy agradable.
‚úÖüëç Producto coreano üá∞üá∑ Cada vez se est√°n haciendo mas populares los productos de cosmetica coreanos y se venden mas en occidente.
‚úÖüëç Como se puede ver en una de las fotos üì∏ la caja viene sellada con un precinto de plastico.

‚ùì No es la opci√≥n m√°s barata. Pero no creo que sea justo que comparemos una crema de esta calidad, con otras mas baratas que vienen en botes gigantes. Es cierto que muchas de estas ultimas hidratan muy bien y se venden mucho. Si a ti te funcionan esas, entonces quiz√° no te merezca la pena gastar lo que cuesta este bote. Si eres de los mios y casi todas esas cremas te parecen muy densas y pringosas, entonces podr√≠as darle una oportunidad.

title: PURITO Luminous Moisture Shea Butter Body Lotion, Shea Butter, Gentle on Skin, Moisturizing, Dry Skin, Pump Bottle, K-Beauty, 300ml / 10.14 fl. oz. (Midnight Romance, 10.14 fl. oz.)
date: Reviewed in Italy on January 16, 2025
content:
Analizziamo gli ingredienti di questa crema:
La formulazione si presenta con:

1. Base principale:
‚Ä¢ Water/Butylene Glycol in testa alla formula come base idratante
‚Ä¢ Diversi derivati dell'etilesilglicole che fungono da emollienti

2. Elementi interessanti:
‚Ä¢ Niacinamide (Vit. B3) - ottimo ingrediente per uniformare l'incarnato e ridurre i pori
‚Ä¢ Glycerin - idratante base molto efficace
‚Ä¢ Butyrospermum Parkii (Burro di Karit√®) - emolliente naturale ricco

3. Conservanti e stabilizzanti:
‚Ä¢ Diversi ingredienti tra cui etilesil stearato e polimeri che aiutano la stabilit√† della formula

La particolarit√† di questa formula √® la presenza di:
‚Ä¢ Derivati glucosidici che migliorano la texture
‚Ä¢ Alcool grasso (non seccante) che aiuta la penetrazione degli attivi
‚Ä¢ Presenza di ingredienti che suggeriscono una texture leggera ma nutriente

Nel complesso, sembra una formulazione moderna che bilancia ingredienti funzionali con una buona sensorialit√†. √à orientata all'idratazione e al comfort sulla pelle, con alcuni attivi interessanti come la Niacinamide.

Il flacone ha il classico tappo a pressione ed √® di plastica, non vetro.
La crema si presenta bianchissima e piuttosto densa.
Sulla pelle tende a creare una pellicola plasticosa che, s√¨ offre morbidezza e idratazione, ma potrebbe dare fastidio se usata in quantit√†.
Non unge comunque, ma consiglierei di iniziare con piccolissime quantit√† su corpo e viso per vedere come ci si trova.

Peccato che ci siano indicazioni solo in lingua inglese, niente italiano (d‚Äôaltronde il prodotto √® Made in UK).
Al momento in cui scrivo il prezzo √® di 27 euro, e mi pare congruo con la qualit√† e la quantit√† di crema offerta.

title: PURITO Luminous Moisture Shea Butter Body Lotion, Shea Butter, Gentle on Skin, Moisturizing, Dry Skin, Pump Bottle, K-Beauty, 300ml / 10.14 fl. oz. (Midnight Romance, 10.14 fl. oz.)
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 16, 2025
content:
The fragrance is quite subtle and definitely not overwhelming. With the various notes to the fragrance, it could be unisex.

A non greasy product which can easily be spread over skin and be absorbed without any residue.

The design of the dispenser bottle means it is a product to be kept at home and not so much for travel. Unless the dispenser tap lid is twisted shut after a pump of solution has been dispensed.

Good for dry skin because it does revitalise it. It's a decent product but does seem expensive to me, priced at ¬£23. For me personally, there isn't a wow factor in it's performance and fragrance, when comparing it to other similar products I have used.

title: PURITO Luminous Moisture Shea Butter Body Lotion, Shea Butter, Gentle on Skin, Moisturizing, Dry Skin, Pump Bottle, K-Beauty, 300ml / 10.14 fl. oz. (Midnight Romance, 10.14 fl. oz.)

content: This is a rich moisture cream, light to the touch but is a bit greasy feeling and so you only use a tiny amount or it takes a while to soak in, or rub in, but it does and it moisturises well. title: PURITO Luminous Moisture Shea Butter Body Lotion, Shea Butter, Gentle on Skin, Moisturizing, Dry Skin, Pump Bottle, K-Beauty, 300ml / 10.14 fl. oz. (Midnight Romance, 10.14 fl. oz.)
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 16, 2025
content:
This body lotion from Purito is so easy to recommend.

It is my second product from this Korean brand and it doesn't disappoint either.

It has minimal scent if any, one of the things why I like some Korean lines.
The selling point for me is the ease of absorption and the fact it doesn't leave any greasy residue on my skin and therefore doesn't transfer onto clothing.

Its moisturising capabilities are fantastic and, for example, I can feel the how it works on my elbows.
My elbows which were kind of rough and dry are currently extremely smooth and soft.
I can't believe it myself to be honest.

My skin is now well hydrated, soft and really silky smooth, especially the elbows.

If you haven't tried Purito body lotion yet, give it a go.
It is also one of those that you don't really need much so it's worth the price.

content: This bottle of body lotion arrived quickly and well packaged with no leaks or spills in transit. I received the Cotton Dreamlight version which has a fairly bold floral scent with a hint of sandalwood and vanilla. I personally find it to be a bit too strong at first, but it does fade down once absorbed. It comes in a good sized 10.14 fluid ounce bottle and has an easy to use push pump dispenser. The lotion is a lightweight consistency that spreads easily meaning a little goes a long way. It does absorb nicely though it takes a bit longer than I typically prefer. No issues with irritation, reactions, or greasiness. I really like that this is a vegan body lotion that is made with allergy friendly fragrance. It left my skin feeling soft and moisturized, and I didn‚Äôt have to reapply it frequently like I have to do with others. The price point is on par with other products of the a similar size and ingredient profile. Overall, this does seem to be a nice lotion with a pleasant fragrance that isn‚Äôt overwhelming once fully absorbed leaving my skin feeling smooth and moisturized that lasts without any heaviness or greasiness. Would recommend.

title: PURITO SEOUL Best Kit - Skincare Routine with Panthenol Cleanser & Cream, Unscented Centella Serum & Toner, For All Skin Types, Gift Set, For Face, Facial Serum, K-Beauty, 3.52 fl. oz.

Whether you're trying the brand for the first time or looking for travel-sized options, this set is an excellent choice.

title: PURITO SEOUL Best Kit - Skincare Routine with Panthenol Cleanser & Cream, Unscented Centella Serum & Toner, For All Skin Types, Gift Set, For Face, Facial Serum, K-Beauty, 3.52 fl. oz.
date: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2025
content:
I am a skincare fanatic and love trying out new products to incorporate into my skincare regimen. I especially focus on ingredients which perform well rather than just packaging or marketing which often lead me to Asian skincare which is known for its performance. Purito is an excellent brand which I had heard rave reviews of but had not tried before so I was eager to spot this sampler set. Each of the steps in the kit is well-formulated and would be an excellent addition to anyone's skincare regimen.

Some of the great ingredients in this line include centella asiatica (aka cica) which is known to reduce inflammation / redness and has anti-aging properties, bamboo which increases the skin's moisture barrier, and panthenol which also increases skin's hydration.

Cleanser: a low-pH is important so that it doesn't disrupt the skin's natural pH balance and so that it doesn't strip the skin from too much moisture. This one is gentle but also effective. I personally have other cleansers that I prefer but would recommend this one if you haven't tried a low-pH cleanser before.

Toner: unlike western toners which can be harsh and abrasive, Asian toners focus on adding moisture back into skin after cleansing. I applied this toner directly with my hands so that I didn't waste any product. It soaked right into the skin, leaving it soft and supple. I don't have much redness so I can't attest to the anti-redness claims but with the centella asiatica ingredient, I would think that this should have calming effects.

Serum: this is a wonderful product which delivers the skincare benefits for the extended daytime / nighttime hours. It feels luxurious on the skin without being heavy. I would definitely continue using this product.

Panthenol Cream: this lotion also delivers similar benefits as the serum but in lotion format. As it is the winter season, I appreciate the additional moisturization and it felt rich and hydrating. It was lightweight which was perfect for my as my skin is on the oilier side.

Sun Lotion: as with many Asian sunscreens, this performed wonderfully! It didn't leave a white cast and didn't feel thick or heavy on my skin.

Overall, this is an amazing set as an introduction to Asin skincare, for travel, or as a sampler for Purito products. I would 100% recommend this!

title: PURITO SEOUL Best Kit - Skincare Routine with Panthenol Cleanser & Cream, Unscented Centella Serum & Toner, For All Skin Types, Gift Set, For Face, Facial Serum, K-Beauty, 3.52 fl. oz.
date: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2025
content:

Unscented Centella Toner
A refreshing toner that preps the skin well. It‚Äôs unscented, which I like, and it works nicely to calm and hydrate.

Unscented Centella Serum
* This was the star of the kit for me! The lightweight texture absorbs quickly and feels soothing and hydrating on the skin.

Panthenol Cream
* This was my least favorite. While it‚Äôs hydrating, the scent was a bit off-putting for me.
Centella Sunblock
* A solid sunscreen option. Lightweight and blends well

This kit is a fantastic way to test Purito‚Äôs products, while I didn‚Äôt care for the cream, the serum alone made this kit worth trying.

My favorite is the sunscreen included in the kit. It's an added layer of moisture and protection before I decide if it's a makeup day or not. I'm 100% happy with all of the products in this travel/sampler kit.

title: PURITO SEOUL Best Kit - Skincare Routine with Panthenol Cleanser & Cream, Unscented Centella Serum & Toner, For All Skin Types, Gift Set, For Face, Facial Serum, K-Beauty, 3.52 fl. oz.

content:
Some products smell like matcha green tea or algae facials which may not be for everyone. Own 3/5 full sized versions. Make up applies well over it. Soothes inflamed skin which is great if you chemical exfoliants as part of your weekly routine. Solid travel kit to keep in gym bag, overnight bag or desk drawer

title: PURITO SEOUL Best Kit - Skincare Routine with Panthenol Cleanser & Cream, Unscented Centella Serum & Toner, For All Skin Types, Gift Set, For Face, Facial Serum, K-Beauty, 3.52 fl. oz.
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 11, 2025
content:
I had only heard of Purito this time last year when I was offered a set of creams to review, and since then, my partner and my mother have been huge fans of them.

This is a lovely little travel set, and having sampled all but the sun cream (as it's just not the appropriate weather to test), they're great - not too oily, tacky/sticky, and absorbs into the skin very well. It is scent-less, and is also very gentle on sensitive skin which my partner has, particularly around the nose.

This makes not only a good travel kit, but lovely little gift!

title: PURITO SEOUL Best Kit - Skincare Routine with Panthenol Cleanser & Cream, Unscented Centella Serum & Toner, For All Skin Types, Gift Set, For Face, Facial Serum, K-Beauty, 3.52 fl. oz.
date: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2025
content: I love Purito moisturizer and it's great for my sensitive skin. So I jumped at the chance to try this sampler. With everything you need for your skin care routine, perfect if you're new to Purito and just want to try everything. Or if you're looking for a skin friendly travel kit for all those beachy or ski destinations, this is a great choice as it even contains a sun lotion. I would have loved to have this kit on vacation when I forgot to reapply my sunscreen and got a burn on my face. I use it the bamboo face lotion when my skin is irritated from too many chemical processes and peels but it would probably be just as soothing on skin with too much sun or wind. Great products.
